cards coverage - 96.18%

  • Files
  • Source
1 
#' Continuous ARD Statistics
2 
#'
3 
#' Compute Analysis Results Data (ARD) for simple continuous summary statistics.
4 
#'
5 
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr
6 
#'   a data frame
7 
#' @param variables ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr
8 
#'   columns to include in summaries.
9 
#' @param by,strata ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr
10 
#'   columns to tabulate by/stratify by for summary statistic
11 
#'   calculation. Arguments are similar, but with an important distinction:
12 
#'
13 
#'   `by`: results are calculated for **all combinations** of the columns specified,
14 
#'      including unobserved combinations and unobserved factor levels.
15 
#'
16 
#'   `strata`: results are calculated for **all _observed_ combinations** of the
17 
#'     columns specified.
18 
#'
19 
#'   Arguments may be used in conjunction with one another.
20 
#' @param statistic ([`formula-list-selector`][syntax])\cr
21 
#'   a named list, a list of formulas,
22 
#'   or a single formula where the list element is a named list of functions
23 
#'   (or the RHS of a formula),
24 
#'   e.g. `list(mpg = list(mean = \(x) mean(x)))`.
25 
#'
26 
#'   The value assigned to each variable must also be a named list, where the names
27 
#'   are used to reference a function and the element is the function object.
28 
#'   Typically, this function will return a scalar statistic, but a function that
29 
#'   returns a named list of results is also acceptable, e.g.
30 
#'   `list(conf.low = -1, conf.high = 1)`. However, when errors occur, the messaging
31 
#'   will be less clear in this setting.
32 
#' @param fmt_fun ([`formula-list-selector`][syntax])\cr
33 
#'   a named list, a list of formulas,
34 
#'   or a single formula where the list element is a named list of functions
35 
#'   (or the RHS of a formula),
36 
#'   e.g. `list(mpg = list(mean = \(x) round(x, digits = 2) |> as.character()))`.
37 
#' @param stat_label ([`formula-list-selector`][syntax])\cr
38 
#'   a named list, a list of formulas, or a single formula where
39 
#'   the list element is either a named list or a list of formulas defining the
40 
#'   statistic labels, e.g. `everything() ~ list(mean = "Mean", sd = "SD")` or
41 
#'   `everything() ~ list(mean ~ "Mean", sd ~ "SD")`.
42 
#' @param fmt_fn `r lifecycle::badge("deprecated")`
43 
#' @inheritParams rlang::args_dots_used
44 
#'
45 
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'
46 
#' @name ard_continuous
47 
#'
48 
#' @examples
49 
#' ard_continuous(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGE")
50 
#'
51 
#' # if a single function returns a named list, the named
52 
#' # results will be placed in the resulting ARD
53 
#' ADSL |>
54 
#'   dplyr::group_by(ARM) |>
55 
#'   ard_continuous(
56 
#'     variables = "AGE",
57 
#'     statistic =
58 
#'       ~ list(conf.int = \(x) t.test(x)[["conf.int"]] |>
59 
#'         as.list() |>
60 
#'         setNames(c("conf.low", "conf.high")))
61 
#'   )
62 
NULL
63 

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_continuous

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
ard_continuous <- function(data, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    226x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    226x
                    
                      
  UseMethod("ard_continuous")

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_continuous

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
ard_continuous.data.frame <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
                                      variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
                                      by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
                                      strata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
                                      statistic = everything() ~ continuous_summary_fns(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
                                      fmt_fun = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
                                      stat_label = everything() ~ default_stat_labels(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
                                      fmt_fn = deprecated(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
                                      ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    225x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    225x
                    
                      
  check_dots_used()

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  # deprecated args ------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    225x
                    
                      
  if (lifecycle::is_present(fmt_fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
    lifecycle::deprecate_soft(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
      when = "0.6.1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
      what = "ard_continuous(fmt_fn)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
      with = "ard_continuous(fmt_fun)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    fmt_fun <- fmt_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    225x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    224x
                    
                      
  .check_no_ard_columns(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
  # process arguments ----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    224x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    224x
                    
                      
    variables = {{ variables }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    224x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    224x
                    
                      
    strata = {{ strata }}

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    224x
                    
                      
  data <- dplyr::ungroup(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    224x
                    
                      
  process_formula_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    224x
                    
                      
    data[variables],

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    224x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    224x
                    
                      
    fmt_fun = fmt_fun,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    224x
                    
                      
    stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    224x
                    
                      
  fill_formula_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    224x
                    
                      
    data[variables],

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    224x
                    
                      
    statistic = formals(asNamespace("cards")[["ard_continuous.data.frame"]])[["stat_label"]] |> eval(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    224x
                    
                      
    stat_label = formals(asNamespace("cards")[["ard_continuous.data.frame"]])[["stat_label"]] |> eval()

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    224x
                    
                      
  check_list_elements(

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    224x
                    
                      
    x = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    224x
                    
                      
    predicate = function(x) is.list(x) && is_named(x) && every(x, is.function),

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    224x
                    
                      
    error_msg =

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    224x
                    
                      
      c("Error in the argument {.arg {arg_name}} for variable {.val {variable}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    224x
                    
                      
        "i" = "Value must be a named list of functions."

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
  # return empty ARD if no variables selected ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    223x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::tibble() |> as_card())

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  # check factor levels --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    222x
                    
                      
  check_no_na_factor_levels(data[c(by, strata)])

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    220x
                    
                      
  check_factor_has_levels(data[c(by, strata)])

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate statistics -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    218x
                    
                      
  df_nested <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    218x
                    
                      
    data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    218x
                    
                      
    nest_for_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    218x
                    
                      
      by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    218x
                    
                      
      strata = strata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    218x
                    
                      
      key = "...ard_nested_data..."

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate statistics indicated by user in statistics argument

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    218x
                    
                      
  df_nested <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    218x
                    
                      
    .calculate_stats_as_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    218x
                    
                      
      df_nested = df_nested,

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    218x
                    
                      
      variables = variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    218x
                    
                      
      statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    218x
                    
                      
      new_col_name = "...ard_all_stats...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    218x
                    
                      
      by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    218x
                    
                      
      strata = strata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    218x
                    
                      
      data = data

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
  # unnest results

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    218x
                    
                      
  df_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    218x
                    
                      
    df_nested |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    218x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(all_ard_groups(), "...ard_all_stats...") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    218x
                    
                      
    tidyr::unnest(cols = "...ard_all_stats...")

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
  # final processing of fmt_fun ------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    218x
                    
                      
  df_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    218x
                    
                      
    .process_nested_list_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    218x
                    
                      
      x = df_results,

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    218x
                    
                      
      arg = fmt_fun,

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    218x
                    
                      
      new_column = "fmt_fun"

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    218x
                    
                      
    .default_fmt_fun()

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
  # final processing of stat labels --------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    218x
                    
                      
  df_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    218x
                    
                      
    .process_nested_list_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    218x
                    
                      
      x = df_results,

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    218x
                    
                      
      arg = stat_label,

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    218x
                    
                      
      new_column = "stat_label",

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    218x
                    
                      
      unlist = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    218x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(stat_label = dplyr::coalesce(.data$stat_label, .data$stat_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
  # add meta data and class ----------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    218x
                    
                      
  df_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    218x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "continuous") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    218x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_column_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    218x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_row_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    218x
                    
                      
    as_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    192

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' Check Protected Column Names

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' Checks that column names in a passed data frame are not protected, that is,

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#' they do not begin with `"...ard_"` and end with `"..."`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' @param exceptions (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#'   character string of column names to exclude from checks

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#' @return returns invisible if check is successful, throws an error message if not.

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- data.frame("ard_x" = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.check_no_ard_columns(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
.check_no_ard_columns <- function(x, exceptions = "...ard_dummy_for_counting...") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    638x
                    
                      
  colnames <- names(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    638x
                    
                      
  ard_colnames <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    638x
                    
                      
    colnames[startsWith(colnames, "...ard_") & endsWith(colnames, "...")] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    638x
                    
                      
    setdiff(exceptions)

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    638x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(ard_colnames)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    !
                    
                      
    "Columns beginning with {.val '...ard_'} and ending with {.val '...'} are not allowed." |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    !
                    
                      
      cli::cli_abort(call = get_cli_abort_call())

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate Continuous Statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate statistics and return in an ARD format

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df_nested (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
#'   a nested data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variables (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
#' @param statistic (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of statistical functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
#' data_nested <- ADSL |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
#'   nest_for_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
#'     by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
#'     strata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
#'     key = "...ard_nested_data..."

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.calculate_stats_as_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
#'   df_nested = data_nested,

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = list(mean = "mean"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
#'   strata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADSL

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
.calculate_stats_as_ard <- function(df_nested, variables, statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
                                    by, strata, data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
                                    new_col_name = "...ard_all_stats...") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    218x
                    
                      
  df_nested[[new_col_name]] <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    218x
                    
                      
    map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    218x
                    
                      
      df_nested[["...ard_nested_data..."]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    218x
                    
                      
      function(nested_data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    867x
                    
                      
        map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    867x
                    
                      
          variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    867x
                    
                      
          function(variable) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    1420x
                    
                      
            map2(

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    1420x
                    
                      
              statistic[[variable]], names(statistic[[variable]]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    1420x
                    
                      
              function(fun, fun_name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    10186x
                    
                      
                .lst_results_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    10186x
                    
                      
                  x = # calculate results, and place in tibble

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    10186x
                    
                      
                    eval_capture_conditions(

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    10186x
                    
                      
                      getOption(

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    10186x
                    
                      
                        "cards.calculate_stats_as_ard.eval_fun",

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    10186x
                    
                      
                        default = expr(do.call(fun, args = list(stats::na.omit(nested_data[[variable]]))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
                      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
                    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    10186x
                    
                      
                  variable = variable,

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    10186x
                    
                      
                  fun_name = fun_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    10186x
                    
                      
                  fun = fun

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
                )

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
              }

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
            ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    1420x
                    
                      
              unname()

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
        ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    867x
                    
                      
          dplyr::bind_rows()

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    218x
                    
                      
  df_nested

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
#' Prepare Results as Data Frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    
                    
                      
#' Function takes the results from [eval_capture_conditions()], which is a

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
#' named list, e.g. `list(result=, warning=, error=)`, and converts it to a data

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
#' frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
#'   the result from [eval_capture_conditions()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variable (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable name of the results

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fun_name (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
#'   name of function called to get results in `x`

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
#' msgs <- eval_capture_conditions({

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
#'   warning("Warning 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
#'   warning("Warning 2")

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
#'   letters[1:2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      
#' })

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.lst_results_as_df(msgs, "result", "mean")

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      
.lst_results_as_df <- function(x, variable, fun_name, fun) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      
  # unnesting results if needed

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    10186x
                    
                      
  if (.is_named_list(x$result, allow_df = TRUE)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (is.data.frame(x$result)) x$result <- unclass(x$result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    84x
                    
                      
    df_ard <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    84x
                    
                      
      dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    84x
                    
                      
        stat_name = names(x$result),

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    84x
                    
                      
        result = unname(x$result),

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    84x
                    
                      
        warning = list(x$warning),

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    84x
                    
                      
        error = list(x$error)

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    328

                    329
                    
                    
                      
  # if result is not a nested list, return a single row tibble

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
  else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    10102x
                    
                      
    df_ard <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    10102x
                    
                      
      map(x, list) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    10102x
                    
                      
      dplyr::as_tibble() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    10102x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    10102x
                    
                      
        stat_name =

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      
        # if the function is a "cards_fn" AND the result is missing, use the provided placeholder stat names

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    10102x
                    
                      
          case_switch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    10102x
                    
                      
            is_empty(.env$x$result) && is_cards_fn(.env$fun) ~ list(get_cards_fn_stat_names(.env$fun)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    10102x
                    
                      
            .default = .env$fun_name

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    10102x
                    
                      
      tidyr::unnest("stat_name")

                    		
                  

                  

                    343

                    344
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    10186x
                    
                      
  df_ard |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    10186x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(variable = .env$variable) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    10186x
                    
                      
    dplyr::rename(stat = "result")

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Convert Nested Lists to Column

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    
                    
                      
#' Some arguments, such as `stat_label`, are passed as nested lists. This

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    
                    
                      
#' function properly unnests these lists and adds them to the results data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    
                    
                      
#'   result data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arg (`list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    
                    
                      
#'   the nested list

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    
                    
                      
#' @param new_column (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    
                    
                      
#'   new column name

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    
                    
                      
#' @param unlist (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    
                    
                      
#'   whether to fully unlist final results

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.process_nested_list_as_df(ard, NULL, "new_col")

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    
                    
                      
.process_nested_list_as_df <- function(x, arg, new_column, unlist = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    
                    
                      
  # add column if not already present

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    1221x
                    
                      
  if (!new_column %in% names(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    1221x
                    
                      
    x[[new_column]] <- list(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    
                    
                      
  # process argument if not NULL, and update new column

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    1221x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(arg)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    620x
                    
                      
    df_argument <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    620x
                    
                      
      imap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    620x
                    
                      
        arg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    620x
                    
                      
        function(enlst_arg, variable) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    736x
                    
                      
          lst_stat_names <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    736x
                    
                      
            x[c("variable", "stat_name")] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    736x
                    
                      
            dplyr::filter(.data$variable %in% .env$variable) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    736x
                    
                      
            unique() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    736x
                    
                      
            {stats::setNames(as.list(.[["stat_name"]]), .[["stat_name"]])} # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    736x
                    
                      
          compute_formula_selector(

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    736x
                    
                      
            data = lst_stat_names,

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    736x
                    
                      
            x = enlst_arg

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    
                    
                      
          ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    394
                    
                    
                      
            # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    395
                    736x
                    
                      
            {dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    396
                    736x
                    
                      
              variable = variable,

                    		
                  

                  

                    397
                    736x
                    
                      
              stat_name = names(.),

                    		
                  

                  

                    398
                    736x
                    
                      
              "{new_column}" := unname(.)

                    		
                  

                  

                    399
                    
                    
                      
            )}

                    		
                  

                  

                    400
                    
                    
                      
          # styler: on

                    		
                  

                  

                    401
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    402
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    403
                    620x
                    
                      
      dplyr::bind_rows()

                    		
                  

                  

                    404
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    405
                    620x
                    
                      
    x <- x |> dplyr::rows_update(df_argument, by = c("variable", "stat_name"), unmatched = "ignore")

                    		
                  

                  

                    406
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    407
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    408
                    1221x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(unlist)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    409
                    612x
                    
                      
    x[[new_column]] <- lapply(x[[new_column]], function(x) x %||% NA) |> unlist()

                    		
                  

                  

                    410
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    411
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    412
                    1221x
                    
                      
  x

                    		
                  

                  

                    413
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    414
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    415
                    
                    
                      
#' Add Default Formatting Functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    416
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    417
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    418
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    419
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    420
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    421
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    422
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    423
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    424
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    425
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::mutate(fmt_fun = NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    426
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    427
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.default_fmt_fun(ard)

                    		
                  

                  

                    428
                    
                    
                      
.default_fmt_fun <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    429
                    609x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    430
                    609x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    431
                    609x
                    
                      
      fmt_fun =

                    		
                  

                  

                    432
                    609x
                    
                      
        pmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    433
                    609x
                    
                      
          list(.data$stat_name, .data$stat, .data$fmt_fun),

                    		
                  

                  

                    434
                    609x
                    
                      
          function(stat_name, stat, fmt_fun) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    435
                    73278x
                    
                      
            if (!is_empty(fmt_fun)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    436
                    38x
                    
                      
              return(fmt_fun)

                    		
                  

                  

                    437
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    438
                    73240x
                    
                      
            if (stat_name %in% c("p", "p_miss", "p_nonmiss")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    439
                    17468x
                    
                      
              return(label_round(digits = 1, scale = 100))

                    		
                  

                  

                    440
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    441
                    55772x
                    
                      
            if (is.integer(stat)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    442
                    46856x
                    
                      
              return(0L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    443
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    444
                    8916x
                    
                      
            if (is.numeric(stat)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    445
                    8892x
                    
                      
              return(1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    446
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    447
                    24x
                    
                      
            return(as.character)

                    		
                  

                  

                    448
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    449
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    450
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    451
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Sort Stacked Hierarchical ARDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge('experimental')`\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' This function is used to sort stacked hierarchical ARDs.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' For the purposes of this function, we define a "variable group" as a combination of ARD rows grouped by the

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' combination of all their variable levels, but excluding any `by` variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`card`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   a stacked hierarchical ARD of class `'card'` created using [ard_stack_hierarchical()] or

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   [`ard_stack_hierarchical_count()`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param sort (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   type of sorting to perform. Value must be one of:

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `"alphanumeric"` - within each hierarchical section of the ARD, groups are ordered alphanumerically (i.e. A to Z)

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     by `variable_level` text.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `"descending"` - within each variable group of the ARD, count sums are calculated for each group and groups are

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     sorted in descending order by sum. If `sort = "descending"`, the `n` statistic is used to calculate variable

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     group sums if included in `statistic` for all variables, otherwise `p` is used. If neither `n` nor `p` are

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     present in `x` for all variables, an error will occur.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   Defaults to `"descending"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso [filter_ard_hierarchical()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @name sort_ard_hierarchical

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @note

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' If overall data is present in `x` (i.e. the ARD was created with `ard_stack_hierarchical(overall=TRUE)`), the

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' overall data will be sorted last within each variable group (i.e. after any other rows with the same combination of

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' variable levels).

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @examplesIf (identical(Sys.getenv("NOT_CRAN"), "true") || identical(Sys.getenv("IN_PKGDOWN"), "true"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
