                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'    where the list element is a vector of variable values. For

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'    `mock_dichotomous()`, only a single value is allowed for each variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param statistic ([`formula-list-selector`][syntax])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   a named list, a list of formulas, or a single formula where the list elements

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   are character vectors of statistic names to appear in the ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   a named list where the list element is a vector of variable values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param label (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of variable labels, e.g. `list(cyl = "No. Cylinders")`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @name mock

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' mock_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables =

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'     list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'       AGEGR1 = factor(c("<65", "65-80", ">80"), levels = c("<65", "65-80", ">80"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'     ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = list(TRTA = c("Placebo", "Xanomeline High Dose", "Xanomeline Low Dose"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fun()

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' mock_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = c("AGE", "BMIBL"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = list(TRTA = c("Placebo", "Xanomeline High Dose", "Xanomeline Low Dose"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   # update the mock to report 'xx.xx' for standard deviations

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   update_ard_fmt_fun(variables = c("AGE", "BMIBL"), stat_names = "sd", fmt_fun = \(x) "xx.xx") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fun()

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname mock

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
mock_categorical <- function(variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
                             statistic = everything() ~ c("n", "p", "N"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
                             by = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    3x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  # check/process inputs -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_named_list_and_vector_elements(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_named_list_and_vector_elements(by)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    3x
                    
                      
  process_formula_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    3x
                    
                      
    data = .empty_data_frame(names(variables)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    3x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_list_elements(

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    3x
                    
                      
    x = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    3x
                    
                      
    predicate = \(x) is.character(x) && all(x %in% c("n", "p", "N")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    3x
                    
                      
    error_msg = "The elements of the {.arg statistic} argument must be vector with one or more of {.val {c('n', 'p', 'N')}}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  # create ARD -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  # build the ARD for the by variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    2x
                    
                      
  ard_by <- .construct_by_variable_ard(by)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  # create ARD for the variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    2x
                    
                      
  ard_variables <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    2x
                    
                      
    dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    2x
                    
                      
      variable = names(.env$variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    2x
                    
                      
      variable_level = map(.data$variable, ~ as.list(.env$variables[[.x]]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    2x
                    
                      
    tidyr::unnest(cols = "variable_level") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    2x
                    
                      
    dplyr::left_join(

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    2x
                    
                      
      enframe(statistic, "variable", "stat_name"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    2x
                    
                      
      by = "variable"

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    2x
                    
                      
    tidyr::unnest(cols = "stat_name") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    2x
                    
                      
    .process_nested_list_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    2x
                    
                      
      arg = rep_named(names(variables), list(default_stat_labels())),

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    2x
                    
                      
      new_column = "stat_label",

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    2x
                    
                      
      unlist = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    2x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    2x
                    
                      
      stat_label = dplyr::coalesce(.data$stat_label, .data$stat_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    2x
                    
                      
      context = "categorical",

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    2x
                    
                      
      stat = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    2x
                    
                      
      error = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    2x
                    
                      
      warning = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    2x
                    
                      
      fmt_fun = map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    2x
                    
                      
        .data$stat_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    2x
                    
                      
        ~ ifelse(.x %in% c("n", "N", "N_obs", "N_miss", "N_nonmiss"), \(x) "xx", \(x) "xx.x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  # merge the by ARD and the primary variable ARD ------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    2x
                    
                      
  merge(ard_by, ard_variables, by = NULL) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    2x
                    
                      
    as_card() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    2x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_row_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    2x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_column_order()

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname mock

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
mock_continuous <- function(variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
                            statistic = everything() ~ c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
                              "N", "mean", "sd", "median",

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
                              "p25", "p75", "min", "max"

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
                            ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
                            by = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    3x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  # check/process inputs -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_class(variables, "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(by)) check_named_list_and_vector_elements(by) # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    3x
                    
                      
  process_formula_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    3x
                    
                      
    data = data.frame(matrix(ncol = length(variables), nrow = 0)) |> stats::setNames(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    3x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_list_elements(

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    3x
                    
                      
    x = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    3x
                    
                      
    predicate = is.character,

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    3x
                    
                      
    error_msg = "The elements of the {.arg statistic} argument must be {.cls character} vector of statistic names."

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
  # create ARD -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
  # build the ARD for the by variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    2x
                    
                      
  ard_by <- .construct_by_variable_ard(by)

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
  # create ARD for the variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    2x
                    
                      
  ard_variables <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    2x
                    
                      
    dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    2x
                    
                      
      variable = .env$variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    2x
                    
                      
      stat_name = map(.data$variable, ~ .env$statistic[[.x]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    2x
                    
                      
    tidyr::unnest(cols = "stat_name") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    2x
                    
                      
    .process_nested_list_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    2x
                    
                      
      arg = rep_named(variables, list(default_stat_labels())),

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    2x
                    
                      
      new_column = "stat_label",

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    2x
                    
                      
      unlist = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    2x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    2x
                    
                      
      stat_label = dplyr::coalesce(.data$stat_label, .data$stat_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    2x
                    
                      
      context = "continuous",

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    2x
                    
                      
      stat = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    2x
                    
                      
      error = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    2x
                    
                      
      warning = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    2x
                    
                      
      fmt_fun = map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    2x
                    
                      
        .data$stat_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    2x
                    
                      
        ~ ifelse(.x %in% c("n", "N", "N_obs", "N_miss", "N_nonmiss"), \(x) "xx", \(x) "xx.x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
  # merge the by ARD and the primary variable ARD ------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    2x
                    
                      
  merge(ard_by, ard_variables, by = NULL) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    2x
                    
                      
    as_card() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    2x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_row_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    2x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_column_order()

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    161

mock_dichotomous <- function(variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
                             statistic = everything() ~ c("n", "p", "N"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
                             by = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    2x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
  # check/process inputs -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_named_list_and_vector_elements(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_list_elements(

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    2x
                    
                      
    x = variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    2x
                    
                      
    predicate = \(x) length(x) == 1L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    2x
                    
                      
    error_msg = "The list values of {.arg variables} argument must be length {.val {1}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    1x
                    
                      
  mock_categorical(variables = variables, statistic = statistic, by = by) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "dichotomous")

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname mock

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
mock_missing <- function(variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
                         statistic = everything() ~ c("N_obs", "N_miss", "N_nonmiss", "p_miss", "p_nonmiss"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
                         by = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    2x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
  # check/process inputs -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_class(variables, "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    2x
                    
                      
  process_formula_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    2x
                    
                      
    data = data.frame(matrix(ncol = length(variables), nrow = 0)) |> stats::setNames(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    2x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_list_elements(

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    2x
                    
                      
    x = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    2x
                    
                      
    predicate = \(x) is.character(x) && all(x %in% c("N_obs", "N_miss", "N_nonmiss", "p_miss", "p_nonmiss")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    2x
                    
                      
    error_msg = "The elements of the {.arg statistic} argument must be vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    2x
                    
                      
                 with one or more of {.val {c('N_obs', 'N_miss', 'N_nonmiss', 'p_miss', 'p_nonmiss')}}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
  # build ARD ------------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    1x
                    
                      
  mock_continuous(variables = variables, statistic = statistic, by = by) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "missing")

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname mock

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
mock_attributes <- function(label) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    2x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    2x
                    
                      
  if (!is_named(label) || !is.list(label)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    1x
                    
                      
      "The {.arg label} argument must be a named list.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    1x
                    
                      
  ard_attributes(

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    1x
                    
                      
    data = .empty_data_frame(names(label)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    1x
                    
                      
    label = label

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname mock

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
mock_total_n <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    1x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    1x
                    
                      
  ard_total_n(data.frame()) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    1x
                    
                      
      stat = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    1x
                    
                      
      fmt_fun = list(\(x) "xx")

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
check_named_list_and_vector_elements <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
    x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
    message = "The {.arg {arg_name}} argument must be a named list, and each element a vector of values.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
    arg_name = rlang::caller_arg(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
    call = get_cli_abort_call(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
    envir = rlang::current_env()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
  # check input is a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(x) && (!is_named(x) || !is.list(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    !
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(message = message, call = call, .envir = envir)

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    8x
                    
                      
  check_list_elements(

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    8x
                    
                      
    x = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    8x
                    
                      
    predicate = \(x) is_vector(x) && !is.list(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    8x
                    
                      
    error_msg = message,

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    8x
                    
                      
    arg_name = arg_name

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
.empty_data_frame <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    4x
                    
                      
  data.frame(matrix(ncol = length(x), nrow = 0)) |> stats::setNames(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
.construct_by_variable_ard <- function(by) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    4x
                    
                      
  ard_by <- tidyr::expand_grid(!!!map(by, as.list))

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
  # rename the by variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    4x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(by)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    2x
                    
                      
    ard_by <- ard_by |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    2x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate("group{i}" := names(by)[i]) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    2x
                    
                      
      dplyr::rename("group{i}_level" := glue::glue("{names(by)[i]}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    4x
                    
                      
  ard_by

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Print

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' `r lifecycle::badge('experimental')`\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Print method for objects of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   object of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   integer specifying the number of rows to print

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param columns (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   string indicating whether to print a selected number of columns or all.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n_col (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   some columns are removed when there are more than a threshold of

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns present. This argument sets that threshold. This is only used

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   when `columns='auto'` and default is `6L`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   Columns `'error'`, `'warning'`, `'context'`, and `'fmt_fun'` *may* be removed

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   from the print. All other columns will be printed, even if more than `n_col`

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns are present.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... ([`dynamic-dots`][rlang::dyn-dots])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   not used

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card' (invisibly)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_categorical(ADSL, variables = AGEGR1) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   print()

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
print.card <- function(x, n = NULL, columns = c("auto", "all"), n_col = 6L, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    39x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  # convert to a data frame so the list columns print the values in the list ---

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    39x
                    
                      
  x_print <- as.data.frame(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  # number of rows to print (modeled after tibbles print) ----------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    39x
                    
                      
  n <- n %||% ifelse(nrow(x_print) > 20L, 10L, nrow(x_print))

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    39x
                    
                      
  x_print <- utils::head(x_print, n = n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  # remove columns -------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    39x
                    
                      
  if (arg_match(columns) %in% "auto") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    39x
                    
                      
    x_print <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    39x
                    
                      
      dplyr::select(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    39x
                    
                      
        x_print, all_ard_groups(), all_ard_variables(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    39x
                    
                      
        any_of(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    39x
                    
                      
          "context", "stat_name", "stat_label", "stat", "stat_fmt",

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    39x
                    
                      
          "fmt_fun", "warning", "error"

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
        ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
    # remove warning and error columns if nothing to report

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    39x
                    
                      
    if (ncol(x_print) > n_col && "warning" %in% names(x_print) && every(x_print[["warning"]], is.null)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    29x
                    
                      
      x_print[["warning"]] <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    39x
                    
                      
    if (ncol(x_print) > n_col && "error" %in% names(x_print) && every(x_print[["error"]], is.null)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    28x
                    
                      
      x_print[["error"]] <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    # remove 'fmt_fun' col if there are many cols

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    39x
                    
                      
    if (ncol(x_print) > n_col) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    24x
                    
                      
      x_print[["fmt_fun"]] <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    # remove 'context' col if there are many cols

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    39x
                    
                      
    if (ncol(x_print) > n_col) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    19x
                    
                      
      x_print[["context"]] <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  # truncate the 'group##_level', 'variable_level', 'stat_label', and 'context' columns ------

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    39x
                    
                      
  x_print <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    39x
                    
                      
    tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    39x
                    
                      
      x_print |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    39x
                    
                      
        dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    39x
                    
                      
          across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    39x
                    
                      
            c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    39x
                    
                      
              all_ard_groups("levels"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    39x
                    
                      
              all_ard_variables("levels"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    39x
                    
                      
              any_of(c("context", "stat_label", "warning", "error"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
            ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    39x
                    
                      
            function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    99x
                    
                      
              lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    99x
                    
                      
                x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    99x
                    
                      
                function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    887x
                    
                      
                  e <- as.character(e) |> paste(collapse = ", ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    887x
                    
                      
                  ifelse(nchar(e) > 9, paste0(substr(e, 1, 8), "\u2026"), e)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
                }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
              )

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    39x
                    
                      
      error = function(e) x_print

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  # for the statistics, round to 3 decimal places ------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    39x
                    
                      
  if ("stat" %in% names(x_print)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    32x
                    
                      
    x_print$stat <- lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    32x
                    
                      
      x_print$stat,

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    32x
                    
                      
      function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    223x
                    
                      
        if (isTRUE(is.numeric(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    163x
                    
                      
          res <- round5(x, digits = 3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    60x
                    
                      
          res <- as.character(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    223x
                    
                      
        if (is_string(res) && nchar(res) > 9) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    6x
                    
                      
          res <- paste0(substr(res, 1, 8), "\u2026")

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    223x
                    
                      
        res

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  # for the formatting function column, abbreviate the print of proper functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    39x
                    
                      
  if ("fmt_fun" %in% names(x_print)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    6x
                    
                      
    x_print$fmt_fun <- lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    6x
                    
                      
      x_print$fmt_fun,

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    6x
                    
                      
      function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    28x
                    
                      
        if (isTRUE(is.function(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    13x
                    
                      
          return("<fn>")

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    15x
                    
                      
        x

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
  # final printing --------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    39x
                    
                      
  cli::cli_text(cli::col_grey("{{cards}} data frame: {nrow(x)} x {ncol(x)}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    39x
                    
                      
  print(x_print)

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    39x
                    
                      
  if (nrow(x) > n) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    9x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_alert_info(cli::col_grey("{nrow(x) - n} more rows"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    9x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_alert_info(cli::col_grey("Use {.code print(n = ...)} to see more rows"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    39x
                    
                      
  if (ncol(x) > ncol(x_print)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    29x
                    
                      
    missing_cols <- names(x) |> setdiff(names(x_print))

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    29x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_alert_info(cli::col_grey(

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    29x
                    
                      
      "{length(missing_cols)} more variable{?s}: {paste(missing_cols, collapse = ', ')}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    39x
                    
                      
  invisible(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Stratified ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' General function for calculating ARD results within subgroups.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' While the examples below show use with other functions from the cards package,

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' this function would primarily be used with the statistical functions in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' cardx functions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .by,.strata ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to tabulate by/stratify by for calculation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   Arguments are similar, but with an important distinction:

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   `.by`: results are tabulated by **all combinations** of the columns specified,

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'       including unobserved combinations and unobserved factor levels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   `.strata`: results are tabulated by **all _observed_ combinations** of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'      columns specified.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'  These argument *should not* include any columns that appear in the `.f` argument.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .f (`function`, `formula`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   a function or a formula that can be coerced to a function with

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   `rlang::as_function()` (similar to `purrr::map(.f)`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Additional arguments passed on to the `.f` function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_strata(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   .by = ARM,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
