#'   .f = ~ ard_continuous(.x, variables = AGE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
ard_strata <- function(.data, .by = NULL, .strata = NULL, .f, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    5x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    5x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(.data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    5x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(.f)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    5x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(.data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  # process inputs -------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    5x
                    
                      
  .f <- rlang::as_function(x = .f, call = get_cli_abort_call())

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    5x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(.data, .by = {{ .by }}, .strata = {{ .strata }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  # nest the data frame --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    5x
                    
                      
  df_nested_data <- nest_for_ard(.data, by = .by, strata = .strata)

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  # run fn on nested data frames -----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    5x
                    
                      
  df_nested_data <- df_nested_data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    5x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(ard = map(.data$data, .f, ...)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    5x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-"data")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  # rename grouping variables --------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  # get the number grouping columns in the calculations

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    5x
                    
                      
  max_group_n <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    5x
                    
                      
    map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    5x
                    
                      
      df_nested_data$ard,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    5x
                    
                      
      ~ dplyr::select(.x, all_ard_groups("names")) |> names()

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    5x
                    
                      
    unlist() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    5x
                    
                      
    unique() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    5x
                    
                      
    sort() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    5x
                    
                      
    str_remove(pattern = "^group") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    5x
                    
                      
    as.integer() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    # if no grouping variables are present, this will return `-Inf`

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    5x
                    
                      
    {suppressWarnings(max(..1 = .))} # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (!is.infinite(max_group_n) && !is_empty(c(.by, .strata))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    2x
                    
                      
    new_group_colnames <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    2x
                    
                      
      c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    2x
                    
                      
        paste0("group", seq_along(c(.by, .strata)) + max_group_n),

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    2x
                    
                      
        paste0("group", seq_along(c(.by, .strata)) + max_group_n, "_level")

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    2x
                    
                      
      sort()

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    2x
                    
                      
    names(df_nested_data)[seq_along(new_group_colnames)] <- new_group_colnames

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
  # unnest ard data frame and return final table -------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    5x
                    
                      
  df_nested_data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    5x
                    
                      
    tidyr::unnest(cols = all_of("ard")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    5x
                    
                      
    as_card() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    5x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_column_order(group_order = "descending")

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Update ARDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Functions used to update ARD formatting functions and statistic labels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' This is a helper function to streamline the update process. If it does not

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' exactly meet your needs, recall that an ARD is just a data frame and it

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' can be modified directly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'  an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variables ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables in `x$variable` to apply update. Default is `everything()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param stat_names (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of the statistic names (i.e. values from `x$stat_name`) to

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply the update.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fmt_fun (`function`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   a function or alias recognized by `alias_as_fmt_fun()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param stat_label (`function`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   a string of the updated statistic label.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param filter (`expression`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   an expression that evaluates to a logical vector identifying rows in `x`

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   to apply the update to. Default is `TRUE`, and update is applied to

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   all rows.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fmt_fn `r lifecycle::badge("deprecated")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @name update_ard

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(ADSL, variables = AGE) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   update_ard_fmt_fun(stat_names = c("mean", "sd"), fmt_fun = 8L) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   update_ard_stat_label(stat_names = c("mean", "sd"), stat_label = "Mean (SD)") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fun()

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' # same as above, but only apply update to the Placebo level

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = ARM,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = AGE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = ~ continuous_summary_fns(c("N", "mean"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   update_ard_fmt_fun(stat_names = "mean", fmt_fun = 8L, filter = group1_level == "Placebo") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fun()

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname update_ard

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
update_ard_fmt_fun <- function(x, variables = everything(), stat_names, fmt_fun, filter = TRUE, fmt_fn = deprecated()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    6x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  # deprecated args ------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (lifecycle::is_present(fmt_fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
    lifecycle::deprecate_soft(

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
      when = "0.6.1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
      what = "update_ard_fmt_fun(fmt_fn)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
      with = "update_ard_fmt_fun(fmt_fun)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
    fmt_fun <- fmt_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  # check and process inputs ---------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    6x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data = dplyr::tibble(!!!rep_named(unique(x$variable), NA)), variables = {{ variables }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_class(stat_names, "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_length(fmt_fun, 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  # construct lgl index condition ----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  # first evaluate the variable and stat_names

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    6x
                    
                      
  idx1 <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    6x
                    
                      
    eval_tidy(expr(.data$variable %in% variables & .data$stat_name %in% stat_names), data = x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  # and then add any additional reqs passed in `filter`

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    6x
                    
                      
  idx2 <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    6x
                    
                      
    tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    6x
                    
                      
      eval_tidy(enquo(filter), data = x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    6x
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
        cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
          c("There was an error evaluating the {.arg filter} argument. See below:",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    1x
                    
                      
            "x" = "{conditionMessage(e)}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
          ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
          call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (!is.vector(idx2) || !is.logical(idx2) || (length(idx2) != 1L && length(idx2) != nrow(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
      "The {.arg filter} argument must be an expression that evaluates to a

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    1x
                    
                      
       {.cls logical} vector of length {.val {1L}} or {.val {nrow(x)}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  # update ARD with new fmt_fun ------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    4x
                    
                      
  x$fmt_fun[idx1 & idx2] <- list(alias_as_fmt_fun(fmt_fun))

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  # return ard -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    3x
                    
                      
  x

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname update_ard

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
update_ard_stat_label <- function(x, variables = everything(), stat_names, stat_label, filter = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  # check and process inputs ---------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    4x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data = dplyr::tibble(!!!rep_named(unique(x$variable), NA)), variables = {{ variables }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_class(stat_names, "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_string(stat_label)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  # construct lgl index condition ----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
  # first evaluate the variable and stat_names

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    4x
                    
                      
  idx1 <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    4x
                    
                      
    eval_tidy(expr(.data$variable %in% variables & .data$stat_name %in% stat_names), data = x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  # and then add any additional reqs passed in `filter`

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    4x
                    
                      
  idx2 <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    4x
                    
                      
    tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    4x
                    
                      
      eval_tidy(enquo(filter), data = x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    4x
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    1x
                    
                      
        cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    1x
                    
                      
          c("There was an error evaluating the {.arg filter} argument. See below:",

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    1x
                    
                      
            "x" = "{conditionMessage(e)}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
          ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    1x
                    
                      
          call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    3x
                    
                      
  if (!is.vector(idx2) || !is.logical(idx2) || (length(idx2) != 1L && length(idx2) != nrow(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    1x
                    
                      
      "The {.arg filter} argument must be an expression that evaluates to a

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    1x
                    
                      
       {.cls logical} vector of length {.val {1L}} or {.val {nrow(x)}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
  # update ARD with new stat_label ---------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    2x
                    
                      
  x$stat_label[idx1 & idx2] <- stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
  # return ard -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    2x
                    
                      
  x

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Add Calculated Row

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Use this function to add a new statistic row that is a function of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' other statistics in an ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`card`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   data frame of class `'card'`

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param expr (`expression`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   an expression

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param stat_name (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   string naming the new statistic

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   Grouping variables to calculate statistics within

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param stat_label (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   string of the statistic label. Default is the `stat_name`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fmt_fun (`integer`, `function`, `string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   a function of an integer or string that can be converted to a function with

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'  `alias_as_fmt_fun()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fmt_fn `r lifecycle::badge("deprecated")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(mtcars, variables = mpg) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_calculated_row(expr = max - min, stat_name = "range")

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(mtcars, variables = mpg) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_calculated_row(

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'     expr =

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'       dplyr::case_when(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'         mean > median ~ "Right Skew",

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'         mean < median ~ "Left Skew",

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'         .default = "Symmetric"

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'       ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'     stat_name = "skew"

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
add_calculated_row <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
                               expr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
                               stat_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
                               by = c(all_ard_groups(), all_ard_variables(), any_of("context")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
                               stat_label = stat_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
                               fmt_fun = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
                               fmt_fn = deprecated()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    4x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    4x
                    
                      
  expr <- enexpr(expr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  # deprecated args ------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (lifecycle::is_present(fmt_fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    lifecycle::deprecate_soft(

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
      when = "0.6.1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
      what = "add_calculated_row(fmt_fn)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
      with = "add_calculated_row(fmt_fun)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
    fmt_fun <- fmt_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(expr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(stat_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_string(stat_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_string(stat_label)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    4x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(x, by = {{ by }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate additional statistics --------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    4x
                    
                      
  ard_calculated_stat <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    4x
                    
                      
    x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    4x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_by(dplyr::pick(any_of(by))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    4x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    4x
                    
                      
      \(x_subgroup, df_groups) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    4x
                    
                      
        if (any(duplicated(x_subgroup$stat_name))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    1x
                    
                      
          cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    1x
                    
                      
            "Duplicate statistics present within {.arg by} groups: {.val {x_subgroup$stat_name[duplicated(x_subgroup$stat_name)]}}",

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
            call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    3x
                    
                      
        new_stat <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    3x
                    
                      
          eval_capture_conditions(

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    3x
                    
                      
            eval_tidy(expr, data = get_ard_statistics(x_subgroup))

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    3x
                    
                      
        if (!is_empty(new_stat[["error"]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1x
                    
                      
          cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
            c("There was an error calculating the new statistic. See below:",

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
              "x" = new_stat[["error"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
            ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1x
                    
                      
            call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    2x
                    
                      
        df_groups |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    2x
                    
                      
          dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    2x
                    
                      
            stat = list(.env$new_stat[["result"]]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    2x
                    
                      
            stat_name = .env$stat_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    2x
                    
                      
            stat_label = .env$stat_label,

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    2x
                    
                      
            fmt_fun = list(.env$fmt_fun %||% ifelse(is.numeric(new_stat[["result"]]), 1L, as.character))

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    4x
                    
                      
    dplyr::bind_rows()

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  # stack passed ARD and new ARD stats -----------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    2x
                    
                      
  dplyr::bind_rows(

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    2x
                    
                      
    x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    2x
                    
                      
    ard_calculated_stat

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD Statistics as List

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Returns the statistics from an ARD as a named list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... ([`dynamic-dots`][rlang::dyn-dots])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   optional arguments indicating rows to subset of the ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   For example, to return only rows where the column `"AGEGR1"` is `"65-80"`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   pass `AGEGR1 %in% "65-80"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .column (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   string indicating the column that will be returned in the list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `"statistic"`

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .attributes (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of column names that will be returned

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   in the list as attributes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `NULL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @return named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' get_ard_statistics(

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   group1_level %in% "Placebo",

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable_level %in% "65-80",

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   .attributes = "stat_label"

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
get_ard_statistics <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
                               ...,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
                               .column = "stat",

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
                               .attributes = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    17x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  # subset the ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    17x
                    
                      
  ard_subset <- dplyr::filter(x, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
  # return a named list of the selected stats

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  # add attributes for the label, formatting function, warnings, and errors

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    17x
                    
                      
  seq_len(nrow(ard_subset)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    17x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    17x
                    
                      
      FUN = function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
        # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    57x
                    
                      
        ard_subset[[.column]][[i]] %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    57x
                    
                      
          {inject(structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    57x
                    
                      
            ., !!!.create_list_for_attributes(ard_subset, .attributes, i)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
          ))}

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
      # styler: on

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    17x
                    
                      
    stats::setNames(ard_subset[["stat_name"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' Create List for Attributes

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ard_subset (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' @param attributes (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   a character vector of attribute names

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' @param i (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'   a row index number

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.create_list_for_attributes(ard, c("group1", "group1_level"), 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
.create_list_for_attributes <- function(ard_subset, attributes, i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    57x
                    
                      
  ret <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    57x
                    
                      
  for (attr in seq_along(attributes)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    6x
                    
                      
    ret <- c(ret, list(ard_subset[[attr]][[i]]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    57x
                    
                      
  stats::setNames(ret, nm = attributes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Rename ARD Variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Rename the grouping and variable columns to their original column names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param columns ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to rename, e.g. selecting columns `c('group1', 'group2', 'variable')`

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   will rename `'group1_level'` to the name of the variable found in `'group1'`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   When, for example, the `'group1_level'` does not exist, the values of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   new column are filled with the values in the `fill` argument.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `c(all_ard_groups("names"), all_ard_variables("names"))`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fill (scalar/glue)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   a scalar to fill column values when the variable does not have levels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   If a character is passed, then it is processed with `glue::glue()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   where the `colname` element is available to inject into the string,

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   e.g. `'Overall {colname}'` may resolve to `'Overall AGE'` for an AGE column.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `'{colname}'`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param unlist `r lifecycle::badge("deprecated")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @return data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' # Example 1 ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' ADSL |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(by = ARM, variables = AGEGR1) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fun() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   rename_ard_columns() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   unlist_ard_columns()

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' # Example 2 ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' ADSL |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(by = ARM, variables = AGE) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fun() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   rename_ard_columns(fill = "Overall {colname}") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   unlist_ard_columns()

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
rename_ard_columns <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
                               columns = c(all_ard_groups("names"), all_ard_variables("names")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
                               fill = "{colname}", unlist = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    27x
                    
                      
  if (!missing(unlist)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1x
                    
                      
    lifecycle::deprecate_warn(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
