                    1x
                    
                      
      when = "0.6.0",

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1x
                    
                      
      what = "cards::rename_ard_columns(unlist)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1x
                    
                      
      with = "unlist_ard_columns()",

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1x
                    
                      
      details = "Argument has been ignored."

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    27x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    27x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    27x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    27x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(x, columns = {{ columns }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    27x
                    
                      
  check_scalar(fill)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    27x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(setdiff(columns, dplyr::select(x, all_ard_groups("names"), all_ard_variables("names")) |> names()))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    1x
                    
                      
    bad_columns <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    1x
                    
                      
      setdiff(columns, dplyr::select(x, all_ard_groups("names"), all_ard_variables("names")) |> names())

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
      c("The {.arg column} argument may only select columns using {.code all_ard_groups(\"names\")}

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
       and {.code all_ard_variables(\"names\")}",

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
        "i" = "{cli::qty(bad_columns)} Column{?s} {.val {bad_columns}} {?is/are} not a valid selection."

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  # separate selected names from levels

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    26x
                    
                      
  column_names <- x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    26x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    26x
                    
                      
      intersect(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    26x
                    
                      
        c(all_ard_groups("names"), all_ard_variables("names")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    26x
                    
                      
        all_of(columns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    26x
                    
                      
    names()

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    26x
                    
                      
  all_new_names <- x[column_names] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    26x
                    
                      
    unlist() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    26x
                    
                      
    unique() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    26x
                    
                      
    discard(is.na) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    26x
                    
                      
    unname()

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (any(all_new_names %in% names(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    protected_names <- all_new_names[all_new_names %in% names(x)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
      "New column name(s) {.val {protected_names}} cannot be added, because they are already present.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    25x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    25x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(...ard_row_order... = dplyr::row_number()) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    25x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_by(dplyr::pick(all_of(column_names))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    25x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    25x
                    
                      
      \(df, df_group) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    40x
                    
                      
        lst_group <- as.list(df_group) |> discard(is.na)

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    40x
                    
                      
        names_group <- names(lst_group)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
        # cycle over all columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    40x
                    
                      
        for (v in names_group) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
          # if level column does not exist, adding it

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    35x
                    
                      
          if (!paste0(v, "_level") %in% names(df)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    3x
                    
                      
            df[[paste0(v, "_level")]] <- list(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    35x
                    
                      
          fill_glued <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    35x
                    
                      
            case_switch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    35x
                    
                      
              is.character(fill) ~

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    35x
                    
                      
                glue::glue_data(.x = lst_group[v] |> set_names("colname"), fill) |> as.character(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    35x
                    
                      
              .default = fill

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
            )

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
          # replace null values

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    35x
                    
                      
          df[[lst_group[[v]]]] <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    35x
                    
                      
            df[[paste0(v, "_level")]] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    35x
                    
                      
            map(~ .x %||% fill_glued)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    35x
                    
                      
          df[[paste0(v, "_level")]] <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    40x
                    
                      
        df |> dplyr::select(-any_of(c(columns, paste0(columns, "_level"))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    25x
                    
                      
    dplyr::bind_rows() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    25x
                    
                      
    dplyr::arrange(!!sym("...ard_row_order...")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    25x
                    
                      
    dplyr::relocate(all_of(all_new_names), .before = 1L) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    25x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-"...ard_row_order...") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    25x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
      # replace NULL values with NA, then unlist

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    25x
                    
                      
      across(all_of(all_new_names), ~ map(., \(value) value %||% NA) |> unlist())

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Print ARD Condition Messages

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Function parses the errors and warnings observed while calculating the

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' statistics requested in the ARD and prints them to the console as messages.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param condition_type (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   indicates how warnings and errors are returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `"inform"` where all are returned as messages.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   When `"identity"`, errors are returned as errors and warnings as warnings.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @return returns invisible if check is successful, throws all condition messages if not.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' # passing a character variable for numeric summary

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(ADSL, variables = AGEGR1) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   print_ard_conditions()

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
print_ard_conditions <- function(x, condition_type = c("inform", "identity")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    10x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, cls = "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    10x
                    
                      
  condition_type <- rlang::arg_match(condition_type, call = get_cli_abort_call())

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  # print condition messages ---------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    9x
                    
                      
  if ("error" %in% names(x)) .cli_condition_messaging(x, msg_type = "error", condition_type = condition_type)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    8x
                    
                      
  if ("warning" %in% names(x)) .cli_condition_messaging(x, msg_type = "warning", condition_type = condition_type)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
  # styler: on

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    9x
                    
                      
  invisible()

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' Print Condition Messages Saved in an ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param msg_type (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   message type. Options are `"warning"` and `"error"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @return returns invisible if check is successful, throws warning/error messages if not.

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = ARM,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = AGE

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.cli_condition_messaging(ard, msg_type = "error")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
.cli_condition_messaging <- function(x, msg_type, condition_type) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    17x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  # filter the ARD for the rows with messages to print

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    17x
                    
                      
  ard_condition <- x |> dplyr::filter(!map_lgl(.data[[msg_type]], is.null))

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  # if no messages, quit the function early

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    17x
                    
                      
  if (nrow(ard_condition) == 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    6x
                    
                      
    return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  # choose the function for color prints for warnings/errors

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    11x
                    
                      
  cli_color_fun <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    11x
                    
                      
    switch(msg_type,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    11x
                    
                      
      "warning" = cli::col_yellow,

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    11x
                    
                      
      "error" = cli::col_red

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  # create a data frame that is one row per message to print

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  # also formats the text that will be printed

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    11x
                    
                      
  ard_msg <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    11x
                    
                      
    ard_condition |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    11x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_by(dplyr::pick(all_ard_groups(), all_ard_variables(), all_of(msg_type))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    11x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    11x
                    
                      
      function(.x, .y) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    16x
                    
                      
        dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
          # this column is the messaging for which groups/variable the message appears in

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    16x
                    
                      
          cli_variable_msg =

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    16x
                    
                      
            dplyr::select(.y, all_ard_variables("names")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    16x
                    
                      
              dplyr::mutate(across(where(is.list), unlist)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    16x
                    
                      
              dplyr::slice(1L) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    16x
                    
                      
              as.list() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    16x
                    
                      
              .cli_groups_and_variable() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    16x
                    
                      
              list(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    16x
                    
                      
          cli_group_msg =

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    16x
                    
                      
            dplyr::select(.y, all_ard_groups()) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    16x
                    
                      
              dplyr::mutate(across(where(is.list), unlist)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    16x
                    
                      
              dplyr::slice(1L) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    16x
                    
                      
              as.list() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    16x
                    
                      
              .cli_groups_and_variable() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    16x
                    
                      
              list(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
          # character vector of all the stat_names the message applies to

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    16x
                    
                      
          all_stat_names = list(.x$stat_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
          # grabs the condition message and colors it with the cli color function

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    16x
                    
                      
          cond_msg = unlist(.y[[msg_type]]) |> lapply(cli_color_fun)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    11x
                    
                      
    dplyr::bind_rows()

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  # and finally, print the messages

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    11x
                    
                      
  cli::cli_inform(

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    11x
                    
                      
    "The following {cli_color_fun(paste0(msg_type, 's'))} were returned during

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    11x
                    
                      
       {.fun {error_call(get_cli_abort_call()) |> rlang::call_name()}}:"

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
  # set cli message function

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (condition_type == "inform") cli_msg_fn <- cli::cli_inform

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    1x
                    
                      
  else if (condition_type == "identity" && msg_type == "warning") cli_msg_fn <- cli::cli_warn

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    1x
                    
                      
  else if (condition_type == "identity" && msg_type == "error") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli_msg_fn <- \(message, ...) cli::cli_abort(message = message, ..., call = get_cli_abort_call())

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
  # styler: on

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    11x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(ard_msg))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    21x
                    
                      
    cli_msg_fn(

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    21x
                    
                      
      paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    21x
                    
                      
        glue::glue(

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    21x
                    
                      
          "For variable {ard_msg$cli_variable_msg[[i]]} ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    21x
                    
                      
          "{switch(!is.null(ard_msg$cli_group_msg[[i]]), paste0('(', ard_msg$cli_group_msg[[i]], ')')) %||% ''} ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    21x
                    
                      
          "and {{.val {{ard_msg$all_stat_names[[i]]}}}} statistic{{?s}}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    21x
                    
                      
        "{ard_msg$cond_msg[[i]]}",

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    21x
                    
                      
        sep = ": "

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    21x
                    
                      
        stats::setNames(switch(msg_type,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    21x
                    
                      
          "warning" = "!",

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    21x
                    
                      
          "error" = "x"

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
        ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    10x
                    
                      
  invisible()

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' Locate Condition Messages in an ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' Prints a string of all `group##`/`group##_level` column values and

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' `variable` column values where condition messages occur, formatted

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' using glue syntax.

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a string

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = ARM,

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = AGE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = ~ list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'     mean = \(x) mean(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'     mean_warning = \(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#'       warning("warn1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'       warning("warn2")

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'       mean(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'     },

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#'     err_fn = \(x) stop("'tis an error")

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.cli_groups_and_variable(ard)

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
.cli_groups_and_variable <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    32x
                    
                      
  names <- names(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
  # format the 'values' or levels of the variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    32x
                    
                      
  levels <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    32x
                    
                      
    x[endsWith(names, "_level")] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    32x
                    
                      
    lapply(\(x) glue::glue("{{.val {{{cli::cli_format(ifelse(is.numeric(x) || is.logical(x), x, as.character(x)))}}}}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
  # rename the levels to remove the '_level' suffix

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    32x
                    
                      
  names(levels) <- sub(pattern = "_level$", replacement = "", x = names(levels))

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
  # first subset on the variable names

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    32x
                    
                      
  ret <- x[grepl(x = names, pattern = "^group[0-9]+$|^variable$")] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
    # add the varname = value where appropriate

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    32x
                    
                      
    imap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    32x
                    
                      
      \(x, colname) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    24x
                    
                      
        if (rlang::is_empty(levels[[colname]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    16x
                    
                      
          return(glue::glue("{{.var {x}}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    8x
                    
                      
        glue::glue("{{.code {x} = {levels[[colname]]}}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    32x
                    
                      
    paste(collapse = ", ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (ret == "") ret <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    32x
                    
                      
  ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Stack ARDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Stack multiple ARD calls sharing common input `data` and `by` variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Optionally incorporate additional information on represented variables, e.g.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' overall calculations, rates of missingness, attributes, or transform results

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' with `shuffle_ard()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' If the `ard_stack(by)` argument is specified, a univariate tabulation of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' by variable will also be returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .by ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to tabulate by in the series of ARD function calls.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   Any rows with `NA` or `NaN` values are removed from all calculations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... ([`dynamic-dots`][rlang::dyn-dots])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   Series of ARD function calls to be run and stacked

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .overall (`logical`)\cr logical indicating whether overall statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   should be calculated (i.e. re-run all `ard_*()` calls with `by=NULL`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .missing (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to include the results of `ard_missing()` for all

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables represented in the ARD. Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .attributes (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to include the results of `ard_attributes()` for all

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables represented in the ARD. Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .shuffle (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to perform `shuffle_ard()` on the final result.

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .total_n (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to include of `ard_total_n()` in the returned ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_stack(

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(variables = "AGEGR1"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(variables = "AGE"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   .by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   .overall = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   .attributes = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_stack(

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(variables = "AGEGR1"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(variables = "AGE"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   .by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   .shuffle = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
ard_stack <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
                      ...,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
                      .by = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
                      .overall = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
                      .missing = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
                      .attributes = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
                      .total_n = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
                      .shuffle = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    22x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  # process arguments ----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    22x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data, .by = {{ .by }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    22x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    22x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    22x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.overall)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    22x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.missing)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    22x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.attributes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    22x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.shuffle)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    22x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.total_n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    22x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(.by) && isTRUE(.overall)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform(

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    1x
                    
                      
      c("The {.arg .by} argument should be specified when using {.code .overall=TRUE}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
        i = "Setting {.code ard_stack(.overall=FALSE)}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
    .overall <- FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  # remove missing `.by` rows --------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    22x
                    
                      
  df_na_by <- is.na(data[.by]) | apply(data[.by], MARGIN = 2, is.nan)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    22x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(.by) && any(df_na_by)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    2x
                    
                      
    rows_with_na <- apply(df_na_by, MARGIN = 1, any)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    2x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform(c("*" = "Removing {.val {sum(rows_with_na)}} row{?s} with

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    2x
                    
                      
                            {.val {NA}} or {.val {NaN}} values in {.val {eval(.by)}} column{?s}."))

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    2x
                    
                      
    data <- data[!rows_with_na, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  # evaluate the dots using common `data` and `by` -----------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    22x
                    
                      
  ard_list <- .eval_ard_calls(data, .by, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
  # add overall ----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.overall)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    5x
                    
                      
    ard_list <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    5x
                    
                      
      ard_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    5x
                    
                      
      .eval_ard_calls(data, .by = character(0), ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  # compute Ns by group / combine main calls -----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(by)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    20x
                    
                      
    ard_full <- bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    20x
                    
                      
      ard_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    20x
                    
                      
      ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    20x
                    
                      
        data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    20x
                    
                      
        variables = all_of(.by)

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
    ard_full <- bind_ard(ard_list, .update = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
  # get all variables represented ----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    20x
                    
                      
  variables <- unique(ard_full$variable) |> setdiff(.by)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
  # missingness ----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.missing)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    2x
                    
                      
    ard_full <- bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    2x
                    
                      
      ard_full,

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    2x
                    
                      
      ard_missing(data = data, by = any_of(.by), variables = all_of(variables))

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (!is_empty(by) && isTRUE(.overall)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    1x
                    
                      
      ard_full <- bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    1x
                    
                      
        ard_full,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    1x
                    
                      
        ard_missing(data = data, by = character(0L), variables = all_of(variables))

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
  # attributes -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.attributes)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    2x
                    
                      
    ard_full <- bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    2x
                    
                      
      ard_full,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    2x
                    
                      
      ard_attributes(data, variables = all_of(c(variables, .by)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
  # total n --------------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.total_n)) {
