                    147
                    3x
                    
                      
    ard_full <- bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    3x
                    
                      
      ard_full,

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    3x
                    
                      
      ard_total_n(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
  # order ----------------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    20x
                    
                      
  ard_full <- tidy_ard_row_order(ard_full)

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
  # shuffle --------------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.shuffle)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    2x
                    
                      
    return(shuffle_ard(ard_full))

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
  # return final ARD -----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    18x
                    
                      
  ard_full

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluate the `ard_*()` function calls

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .by ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to tabulate by in the series of ARD function calls

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... ([`dynamic-dots`][rlang::dyn-dots])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#'   Series of ARD function calls to be run and stacked

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#' @return list of ARD data frames of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.eval_ard_calls(

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#'   .by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(variables = "AGEGR1"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(variables = "AGE")

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
.eval_ard_calls <- function(data, .by, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
  # capture quosures -----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    27x
                    
                      
  dots <- enquos(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
  # run the ARD calls -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    27x
                    
                      
  imap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    27x
                    
                      
    dots,

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    27x
                    
                      
    function(x, y) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    41x
                    
                      
      if (!is_call_simple(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    2x
                    
                      
        if (identical(y, "by")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    1x
                    
                      
          cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    1x
                    
                      
            c("Cannot evaluate expression {.code {y} = {quo_squash(x)}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    1x
                    
                      
              i = "Did you mean {.code .{y} = {quo_squash(x)}}?"

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
            ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    1x
                    
                      
            call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    1x
                    
                      
        cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    1x
                    
                      
          "{.fun cards::ard_stack} works with {.help [simple calls](rlang::call_name)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    1x
                    
                      
           and {.code {as_label(x)}} is not simple.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    1x
                    
                      
          call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    39x
                    
                      
      x_ns <- call_ns(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    39x
                    
                      
      x_fn <- call_name(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    39x
                    
                      
      x_args <- call_args(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
      # if a function was namespaced, then grab function from that pkg's Namespace

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
      # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    39x
                    
                      
      final_fn <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    39x
                    
                      
        if (is.null(x_ns)) x_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    39x
                    
                      
        else get(x_fn, envir = asNamespace(x_ns))

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
      # styler: on

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    39x
                    
                      
      do.call(final_fn, c(list(data = data, by = .by), x_args), envir = attr(x, ".Environment"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD Selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' These selection helpers match variables according to a given pattern.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' - `all_ard_groups()`: Function selects grouping columns, e.g. columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   named `"group##"` or `"group##_level"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' - `all_ard_variables()`: Function selects variables columns, e.g. columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   named `"variable"` or `"variable_level"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' - `all_ard_group_n()`: Function selects `n` grouping columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' - `all_missing_columns()`: Function selects columns that are all `NA` or empty.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param types (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   type(s) of columns to select. `"names"` selects the columns variable name columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   and `"levels"` selects the level columns. Default is `c("names", "levels")`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   integer(s) indicating which grouping columns to select.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @return tidyselect output

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @name selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' ard |> dplyr::select(all_ard_groups())

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' ard |> dplyr::select(all_ard_variables())

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
all_ard_groups <- function(types = c("names", "levels")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    3128x
                    
                      
  types <- arg_match(types, values = c("names", "levels"), multiple = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    3128x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, c("names", "levels"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    2701x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::matches("^group[0-9]+$|^group[0-9]+_level$"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    427x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, "names")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    274x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::matches("^group[0-9]+$$"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    153x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, "levels")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    153x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::matches("^group[0-9]+_level$"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
all_ard_variables <- function(types = c("names", "levels")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    2022x
                    
                      
  types <- arg_match(types, values = c("names", "levels"), multiple = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    2022x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, c("names", "levels"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1795x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::any_of(c("variable", "variable_level")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    227x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, "names")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    78x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::any_of("variable"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    149x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, "levels")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    149x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::any_of("variable_level"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
all_ard_group_n <- function(n, types = c("names", "levels")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    353x
                    
                      
  types <- arg_match(types, values = c("names", "levels"), multiple = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    353x
                    
                      
  group_cols <- character(0L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    196x
                    
                      
  if ("names" %in% types) group_cols <- c(group_cols, paste0("group", n)) # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    196x
                    
                      
  if ("levels" %in% types) group_cols <- c(group_cols, paste0("group", n, "_level")) # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    353x
                    
                      
  check_integerish(n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    353x
                    
                      
  any_of(sort(group_cols))

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
all_missing_columns <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    15x
                    
                      
  where(\(x) case_switch(is.list(x) ~ all_empty(x), .default = all_na(x)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    76x
                    
                      
all_na <- function(x) all(is.na(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    88x
                    
                      
all_empty <- function(x) all(map_lgl(x, is_empty))

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD as Nested List

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' `r lifecycle::badge('experimental')`\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert ARDs to nested lists.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a nested list

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(mtcars, by = "cyl", variables = c("mpg", "hp")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   as_nested_list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
as_nested_list <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    1x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  # check in inputs ------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    1x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, cls = "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  # format/round the statistics, if not already done ---------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!"stat_fmt" %in% names(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    1x
                    
                      
    x <- apply_fmt_fun(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  # construct the nested lists to convert to JSON ------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    1x
                    
                      
  lst_pre_json <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    1x
                    
                      
    seq_len(nrow(x)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    1x
                    
                      
    lapply(FUN = function(i) .one_row_ard_to_nested_list(x[i, ]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  # construct nested list that will be converted to JSON -----------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    1x
                    
                      
  lst_return <- list() # initialize empty list that will be populated with results

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    1x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    24x
                    
                      
    eval(lst_pre_json[[i]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  # return nested list result --------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    1x
                    
                      
  lst_return

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert One Row to Nested List

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card' with one row

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an expression that represents an element of a nested list

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(mtcars, variables = mpg) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::filter(dplyr::row_number() %in% 1L) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fun() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'   cards:::.one_row_ard_to_nested_list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
.one_row_ard_to_nested_list <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    24x
                    
                      
  df_preparation <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    24x
                    
                      
    x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    # variable levels are originally stored in lists. unlisting here and saving in tibble as a scalar

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    24x
                    
                      
      across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
        # TODO: Does the statistic column need to remain in a list for more complex returns?

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    24x
                    
                      
        .cols = where(is.list) & (dplyr::matches("^group[0-9]+_level$") | any_of("variable_level")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    24x
                    
                      
        .fns = function(x) x[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    # reorder with primary variable first, followed by stratum

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(., all_of(colnames(.) |> sort())) %>% # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    24x
                    
                      
      any_of(c("variable", "variable_level")), starts_with("group"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    24x
                    
                      
      "stat_name", "stat", "stat_fmt", "warning", "error", "context" # TODO: we could apply a formatting function and add that here

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    # drop columns that are NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-(where(function(x) all(is.na(x))) & (starts_with("group") | any_of("variable_level"))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  # create a character string of the code, that we later convert to an expression

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # TODO: converting strings to expressions feels hacky...is there a better way?

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    24x
                    
                      
  chr_nested_list_specification <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    24x
                    
                      
    df_preparation |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(any_of(c("variable", "variable_level")), starts_with("group"), "stat_name") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    24x
                    
                      
    as.list() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    24x
                    
                      
    imap(function(x, y) glue::glue("[[{shQuote(y)}]][[{shQuote(x)}]]")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    24x
                    
                      
    unlist() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    24x
                    
                      
    paste(collapse = "") %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    # 'lst_return' is the name of the nested list that will be converted to JSON

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    24x
                    
                      
    {paste0("lst_return", .)} # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  # creating final expression defining the results within the nested list

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    24x
                    
                      
  expr(

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    24x
                    
                      
    !!parse_expr(chr_nested_list_specification) <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    24x
                    
                      
      !!dplyr::select(

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    24x
                    
                      
        df_preparation,

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    24x
                    
                      
        any_of(c("stat", "stat_fmt", "warning", "error", "context"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
        # this essentially flattens the nested list one level, while maintaining the names

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    24x
                    
                      
        imap(function(x, y) x[[1]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Stacked Hierarchical ARD Statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Use these functions to calculate multiple summaries of nested or hierarchical data

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' in a single call.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ard_stack_hierarchical()`: Calculates *rates* of events (e.g. adverse events)

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   utilizing the `denominator` and `id` arguments to identify the rows in `data`

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   to include in each rate calculation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ard_stack_hierarchical_count()`: Calculates *counts* of events utilizing

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   all rows for each tabulation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @section Subsetting Data for Rate Calculations:

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' To calculate event rates, the `ard_stack_hierarchical()` function identifies

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' rows to include in the calculation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' First, the primary data frame is sorted by the columns identified in

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' the `id`, `by`, and `variables` arguments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' As the function cycles over the variables specified in the `variables` argument,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' the data frame is grouped by `id`, `intersect(by, names(denominator))`, and `variables`

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' utilizing the last row within each of the groups.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' For example, if the call is

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' `ard_stack_hierarchical(data = ADAE, variables = c(AESOC, AEDECOD), id = USUBJID)`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' then we'd first subset ADAE to be one row within the grouping `c(USUBJID, AESOC, AEDECOD)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' to calculate the event rates in `'AEDECOD'`. We'd then repeat and

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' subset ADAE to be one row within the grouping `c(USUBJID, AESOC)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' to calculate the event rates in `'AESOC'`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @section Overall Argument:

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' When we set `overall=TRUE`, we wish to re-run our calculations removing the

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' stratifying columns. For example, if we ran the code below, we results would

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' include results with the code chunk being re-run with `by=NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' ```r

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_stack_hierarchical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADAE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = c(AESOC, AEDECOD),

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = TRTA,

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   denominator = ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   id = USUBJID,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   overall = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' ```

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' But there is another case to be aware of: when the `by` argument includes

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' columns that are not present in the `denominator`, for example when tabulating

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' results by AE grade or severity in addition to treatment assignment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' In the example below, we're tabulating results by treatment assignment and

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' AE severity. By specifying `overall=TRUE`, we will re-run the to get

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' results with `by = AESEV` and again with `by = NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' ```r

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_stack_hierarchical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADAE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = c(AESOC, AEDECOD),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = c(TRTA, AESEV),

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'   denominator = ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   id = USUBJID,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'   overall = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' ```

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ard_hierarchical

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ard_stack

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variables ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'   Specifies the nested/hierarchical structure of the data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'   The variables that are specified here and in the `include` argument

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'   will have summary statistics calculated.

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @param id ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'   argument used to subset `data` to identify rows in `data` to calculate

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'   event rates in `ard_stack_hierarchical()`. See details below.

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @param denominator (`data.frame`, `integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'   used to define the denominator and enhance the output.

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'   The argument is required for `ard_stack_hierarchical()` and optional

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#'   for `ard_stack_hierarchical_count()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'   - the univariate tabulations of the `by` variables are calculated with `denominator`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'     when a data frame is passed, e.g. tabulation of the treatment assignment

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'     counts that may appear in the header of a table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'   - the `denominator` argument must be specified when `id` is used to

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#'     calculate the event rates.

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'   - if `total_n=TRUE`, the `denominator` argument is used to return the total N

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @param include ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#'   Specify the subset a columns indicated in the `variables` argument for which

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'   summary statistics will be returned. Default is `everything()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' @param overall (scalar `logical`)\cr logical indicating whether overall statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'   should be calculated (i.e. repeat the operations with `by=NULL` in _most cases_, see below for details).

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @param over_variables (scalar `logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' logical indicating whether summary statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#'   should be calculated over or across the columns listed in the `variables` argument.

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @param attributes (scalar `logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to include the results of `ard_attributes()` for all

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables represented in the ARD. Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @param total_n (scalar `logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to include of `ard_total_n(denominator)` in the returned ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @param shuffle (scalar `logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to perform `shuffle_ard()` on the final result.

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' @name ard_stack_hierarchical

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_stack_hierarchical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADAE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = c(AESOC, AEDECOD),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = TRTA,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'   denominator = ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#'   id = USUBJID

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_stack_hierarchical_count(

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADAE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = c(AESOC, AEDECOD),

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = TRTA,

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'   denominator = ADSL

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_stack_hierarchical

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
ard_stack_hierarchical <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
    data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
    variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
    by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
    id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
    denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
    include = everything(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    statistic = everything() ~ c("n", "N", "p"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
    overall = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
    over_variables = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    attributes = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
    total_n = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
    shuffle = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    34x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    34x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    34x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    34x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(denominator)

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    33x
                    
                      
  cards::process_selectors(data, id = {{ id }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
  # denominator must a data frame, or integer

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    33x
                    
                      
  if (!is.data.frame(denominator) && !is_integerish(denominator)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    1x
                    
                      
      "The {.arg denominator} argument must be a {.cls data.frame} or an {.cls integer}, not {.obj_type_friendly {denominator}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
  # check the id argument is not empty

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    32x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(id)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    1x
                    
                      
      "Argument {.arg id} cannot be empty.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
  # create ARD -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    31x
                    
                      
  internal_stack_hierarchical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    31x
                    
                      
    data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    31x
                    
                      
    variables = {{ variables }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
