                    31x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    31x
                    
                      
    id = {{ id }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    31x
                    
                      
    denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    31x
                    
                      
    include = {{ include }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    31x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    31x
                    
                      
    overall = overall,

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    31x
                    
                      
    over_variables = over_variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    31x
                    
                      
    attributes = attributes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    31x
                    
                      
    total_n = total_n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    31x
                    
                      
    shuffle = shuffle

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_stack_hierarchical

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
ard_stack_hierarchical_count <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
    data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
    variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
    by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
    denominator = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
    include = everything(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
    overall = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
    over_variables = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
    attributes = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
    total_n = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
    shuffle = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    18x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    18x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
  # denominator must be empty, a data frame, or integer

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    18x
                    
                      
    !is_empty(denominator) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    18x
                    
                      
      !is.data.frame(denominator) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    18x
                    
                      
      !is_integerish(denominator)

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    1x
                    
                      
      "The {.arg denominator} argument must be empty, a {.cls data.frame}, or an {.cls integer}, not {.obj_type_friendly {denominator}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
  # create ARD -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    17x
                    
                      
  internal_stack_hierarchical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    17x
                    
                      
    data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    17x
                    
                      
    variables = {{ variables }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    17x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    17x
                    
                      
    id = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    17x
                    
                      
    denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    17x
                    
                      
    include = {{ include }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    17x
                    
                      
    statistic = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    17x
                    
                      
    overall = overall,

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    17x
                    
                      
    over_variables = over_variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    17x
                    
                      
    attributes = attributes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    17x
                    
                      
    total_n = total_n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    17x
                    
                      
    shuffle = shuffle

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
internal_stack_hierarchical <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
    data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
    variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
    by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
    id = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
    denominator = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
    include = everything(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
    statistic = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
    overall = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
    over_variables = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
    attributes = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
    total_n = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
    shuffle = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
    include_uni_by_tab = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
  # process inputs -------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    60x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    60x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    60x
                    
                      
  cards::process_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    60x
                    
                      
    data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    60x
                    
                      
    variables = {{ variables }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    60x
                    
                      
    id = {{ id }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    60x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }}

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    60x
                    
                      
  cards::process_selectors(data[variables], include = {{ include }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    60x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(overall)

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    60x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(over_variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    60x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(attributes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    60x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(total_n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    60x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(shuffle)

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
  # both variables and include must be specified

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    60x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables) || is_empty(include)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    1x
                    
                      
      "Arguments {.arg variables} and {.arg include} cannot be empty.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
  # the last `variables` variable should be included

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    59x
                    
                      
  if (!utils::tail(variables, 1L) %in% include) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    1x
                    
                      
      "The last column specified in the {.arg variables} (i.e. {.val {utils::tail(variables, 1L)}}) must be in the {.arg include} argument.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(by) && isTRUE(overall)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform(

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    1x
                    
                      
      c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    1x
                    
                      
        "The {.arg by} argument must be specified when using {.code overall=TRUE}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    1x
                    
                      
        i = "Setting {.code overall=FALSE}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    1x
                    
                      
    overall <- FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (!is.data.frame(denominator) && isTRUE(overall)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform(

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    1x
                    
                      
      c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    1x
                    
                      
        "The {.arg denominator} argument must be specified as a data frame when using {.code overall=TRUE}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    1x
                    
                      
        i = "Setting {.code overall=FALSE}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    1x
                    
                      
    overall <- FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(denominator) && isTRUE(total_n)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform(

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    1x
                    
                      
      c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    1x
                    
                      
        "The {.arg denominator} argument must be specified when using {.code total_n=TRUE}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    1x
                    
                      
        i = "Setting {.code total_n=FALSE}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    1x
                    
                      
    total_n <- FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
  # drop missing values --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    58x
                    
                      
  df_na_nan <- is.na(data[c(by, variables)]) |

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    58x
                    
                      
    apply(data[c(by, variables)], MARGIN = 2, is.nan)

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (any(df_na_nan)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    2x
                    
                      
    rows_with_na <- apply(df_na_nan, MARGIN = 1, any)

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    2x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    2x
                    
                      
      "*" = "Removing {.val {sum(rows_with_na)}} row{?s} from {.arg data} with

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    2x
                    
                      
                            {.val {NA}} or {.val {NaN}} values in {.val {c(by, variables)}} column{?s}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    2x
                    
                      
    data <- data[!rows_with_na, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
  # remove missing by variables from `denominator`

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    58x
                    
                      
    is.data.frame(denominator) && !is_empty(intersect(by, names(denominator)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    44x
                    
                      
    df_na_nan_denom <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    44x
                    
                      
      is.na(denominator[intersect(by, names(denominator))]) |

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    44x
                    
                      
        apply(denominator[intersect(by, names(denominator))], MARGIN = 2, is.nan)

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    44x
                    
                      
    if (any(df_na_nan_denom)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    1x
                    
                      
      rows_with_na_denom <- apply(df_na_nan_denom, MARGIN = 1, any)

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    1x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_inform(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    1x
                    
                      
        "*" = "Removing {.val {sum(rows_with_na_denom)}} row{?s} from {.arg denominator} with

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    1x
                    
                      
                            {.val {NA}} or {.val {NaN}} values in {.val {intersect(by, names(denominator))}} column{?s}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
      ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    1x
                    
                      
      denominator <- denominator[!rows_with_na_denom, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      
  # sort data if using `ard_hierarchical(id)` ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(id)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    37x
                    
                      
    data <- dplyr::arrange(data, dplyr::pick(all_of(c(id, by, variables))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      
  } # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
  # print denom columns if not 100% clear which are used

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(id) && is.data.frame(denominator)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    37x
                    
                      
    denom_cols <- intersect(by, names(denominator))

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    37x
                    
                      
    if (!setequal(by, denom_cols)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    3x
                    
                      
      msg <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    3x
                    
                      
        ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    3x
                    
                      
          is_empty(denom_cols),

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    3x
                    
                      
          "Denominator set by number of rows in {.arg denominator} data frame.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    3x
                    
                      
          "Denominator set by {.val {denom_cols}} column{?s} in {.arg denominator} data frame."

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    3x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_inform(c("i" = msg))

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    
                    
                      
  # go about calculating the statistics within the variables -------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    
                    
                      
  # define index in `variables` that also appear in `include`

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    58x
                    
                      
  which_include <- which(variables %in% include)

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    58x
                    
                      
  lst_results <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    58x
                    
                      
  for (i in which_include) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    109x
                    
                      
    lst_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    109x
                    
                      
      lst_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    109x
                    
                      
      append(

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    109x
                    
                      
        .run_hierarchical_fun(

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    109x
                    
                      
          data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    109x
                    
                      
          variables = variables[seq_len(i)],

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    109x
                    
                      
          by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    109x
                    
                      
          denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    109x
                    
                      
          id = id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    109x
                    
                      
          statistic = statistic

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    
                    
                      
        ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    109x
                    
                      
          list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate results overall if requested -------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(overall)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    10x
                    
                      
    for (i in which_include) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    17x
                    
                      
      lst_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    17x
                    
                      
        lst_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    17x
                    
                      
        append(

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    17x
                    
                      
          .run_hierarchical_fun(

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    17x
                    
                      
            data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    17x
                    
                      
            variables = variables[seq_len(i)],

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    17x
                    
                      
            by = setdiff(by, names(denominator)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    17x
                    
                      
            denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    17x
                    
                      
            id = id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    17x
                    
                      
            statistic = statistic

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    
                    
                      
          ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    17x
                    
                      
            list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    
                    
                      
      # if there are columns in `by` not present in `denominator`, re-run with `by = NULL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    17x
                    
                      
      if (!is_empty(setdiff(by, names(denominator)))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    5x
                    
                      
        lst_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    5x
                    
                      
          lst_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    5x
                    
                      
          append(

                    		
                  

                  

                    394
                    5x
                    
                      
            .run_hierarchical_fun(

                    		
                  

                  

                    395
                    5x
                    
                      
              data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    396
                    5x
                    
                      
              variables = variables[seq_len(i)],

                    		
                  

                  

                    397
                    5x
                    
                      
              by = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    398
                    5x
                    
                      
              denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    399
                    5x
                    
                      
              id = id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    400
                    5x
                    
                      
              statistic = statistic

                    		
                  

                  

                    401

                    402
                    5x
                    
                      
              list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    403
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    404
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    405
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    406
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    407
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    408
                    
                    
                      
  # add univariate tabulations of by variables ---------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    409
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    410
                    58x
                    
                      
    isTRUE(include_uni_by_tab) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    411
                    58x
                    
                      
      is.data.frame(denominator) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    412
                    58x
                    
                      
      !is_empty(intersect(by, names(denominator)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    413

                    414
                    32x
                    
                      
    lst_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    415
                    32x
                    
                      
      lst_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    416
                    32x
                    
                      
      append(

                    		
                  

                  

                    417
                    32x
                    
                      
        ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    418
                    32x
                    
                      
          data = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    419

          variables = all_of(intersect(by, names(denominator)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    420
                    
                    
                      
        ) |>

          list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    422
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    423

                    424
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    425
                    
                    
                      
  # add overall row if requested -----------------------------------------------

  if (isTRUE(over_variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    427

    lst_results <-

      lst_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    429

      append(

                    		
                  

                  

                    430
                    
                    
                      
        # need to use this call to also re-run for `overall=TRUE` when specified

                    		
                  

                  

                    431
                    12x
                    
                      
        rlang::call2(

                    		
                  

                  

                    432
                    12x
                    
                      
          "internal_stack_hierarchical",

                    		
                  

                  

                    433
                    12x
                    
                      
          data = expr(

                    		
                  

                  

                    434
                    12x
                    
                      
            data |> dplyr::mutate(..ard_hierarchical_overall.. = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    435

                    436
                    12x
                    
                      
          variables = "..ard_hierarchical_overall..",

                    		
                  

                  

                    437

          by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    438

          id = id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    439
                    12x
                    
                      
          include = "..ard_hierarchical_overall..",

                    		
                  

                  

                    440
                    12x
                    
                      
          denominator = expr(denominator),

                    		
                  

                  

                    441
                    12x
                    
                      
          statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    442
                    12x
                    
                      
          overall = overall,

                    		
                  

                  

                    443
                    12x
                    
                      
          over_variables = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    444
                    12x
                    
                      
          attributes = FALSE,

                    12x
                    
                      
          total_n = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    446
                    12x
                    
                      
          shuffle = FALSE,

          include_uni_by_tab = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    448
                    
                    
                      
        ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    449
                    
                    
                      
          {

                    		
                  

                  

                    450
                    12x
                    
                      
            suppressMessages(eval_tidy(.))

                    		
                  

                  

                    451
                    12x
                    
                      
          } |> # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    452
                    12x
                    
                      
          list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    453
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    454
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    455
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    456
                    
                    
                      
  # add attributes if requested ------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    457
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(attributes)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    458
                    1x
                    
                      
    lst_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    459
                    1x
                    
                      
      lst_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    460
                    1x
                    
                      
      append(

                    		
                  

                  

                    461
                    1x
                    
                      
        ard_attributes(dplyr::select(data, any_of(c(by, variables)))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    462
                    1x
                    
                      
          list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    463
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    464
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    465
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    466
                    
                    
                      
  # add total n if requested ---------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    467
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(total_n) && is.data.frame(denominator)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    468
                    1x
                    
                      
    lst_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    469
                    1x
                    
                      
      lst_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    470
                    1x
                    
                      
      append(ard_total_n(denominator) |> list())

                    		
                  

                  

                    471
                    57x
                    
                      
  } else if (isTRUE(total_n) && is_integerish(denominator)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    472
                    1x
                    
                      
    lst_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    473
                    1x
                    
                      
      lst_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    474
                    1x
                    
                      
      append(

                    		
                  

                  

                    475
                    1x
                    
                      
        ard_total_n(data) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    476
                    1x
                    
                      
          dplyr::mutate(stat = list(as.integer(denominator))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    477
                    1x
                    
                      
          list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    478
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    479
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    480
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    481
                    
                    
                      
  # combine results ------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    482
                    58x
                    
                      
  result <- lst_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    483
                    58x
                    
                      
    dplyr::bind_rows() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    484
                    58x
                    
                      
    cards::tidy_ard_column_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    485
                    58x
                    
                      
    cards::tidy_ard_row_order()

                    		
                  

                  

                    486
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    487
                    
                    
                      
  # shuffle if requested -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    488
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(shuffle)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    489
                    !
                    
                      
    result <- shuffle_ard(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    490
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    491
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    492
                    
                    
                      
  # append attributes used for sorting/filtering -------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    493
                    58x
                    
                      
  attr(result, "args") <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    494
                    58x
                    
                      
    by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    495
                    58x
                    
                      
    variables = variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    496
                    58x
                    
                      
    include = include

                    		
                  

                  

                    497
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    498
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    499
                    
                    
                      
  # sort ARD alphanumerically --------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    500
                    58x
                    
                      
  result <- result |> sort_ard_hierarchical(sort = "alphanumeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    501
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    502
                    
                    
                      
  # return final result --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    503
                    58x
                    
                      
  result |> as_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    504
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    505
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    506
                    
                    
                      
# this function calculates either the counts or the rates of the events

                    		
                  

                  

                    507
                    
                    
                      
.run_hierarchical_fun <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    508
                    
                    
                      
    data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    509
                    
                    
                      
    variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    510
                    
                    
                      
    by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    511
                    
                    
                      
    denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    512
                    
                    
                      
    id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    513
                    
                    
                      
    statistic) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    514
                    131x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(id)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    515
                    51x
                    
                      
    ard_hierarchical_count(

                    		
                  

                  

                    516
                    51x
                    
                      
      data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    517
                    51x
                    
                      
      variables = all_of(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    518
                    51x
                    
                      
      by = all_of(by)

                    		
                  

                  

                    519
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    520
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    521
                    80x
                    
                      
    ard_hierarchical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    522
                    80x
                    
                      
      data = data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    523
                    80x
                    
                      
        dplyr::slice_tail(

                    		
                  

                  

                    524
                    80x
                    
                      
          n = 1L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    525
                    80x
                    
                      
          by = all_of(c(id, intersect(by, names(denominator)), variables))

                    		
                  

                  

                    526
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    527
                    80x
                    
                      
      variables = all_of(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    528
                    80x
                    
                      
      by = all_of(by),

                    		
                  

                  

                    529
                    80x
                    
                      
      denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    530
                    80x
                    
                      
      id = all_of(id),

                    		
                  

                  

                    531
                    80x
                    
                      
      statistic = statistic

                    		
                  

                  

                    532
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    533
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    534
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Shuffle ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge('experimental')`\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' This function ingests an ARD object and shuffles the information to prepare for analysis.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' Helpful for streamlining across multiple ARDs. Combines each group/group_level into 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' column, back fills missing grouping values from the variable levels where possible, and

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' optionally trims statistics-level metadata.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param trim (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical representing whether or not to trim away statistic-level metadata and filter

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   only on numeric statistic values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a tibble

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(ADSL, variables = "ARM")

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   shuffle_ard()

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
shuffle_ard <- function(x, trim = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    19x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    19x
                    
                      
  check_class(x = x, cls = "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    19x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(trim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  # make sure columns are in order & add index for retaining order

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    19x
                    
                      
  dat_cards <- x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    19x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_column_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    19x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_row_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(..cards_idx.. = dplyr::row_number())

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  # fill stat label if missing

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    19x
                    
                      
  dat_cards <- dat_cards |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(dplyr::across(any_of("stat_label"), ~ dplyr::coalesce(.x, stat_name)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  # split up the data into data/variable info & cards info

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    19x
                    
                      
  vars_ard <- dat_cards |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(all_ard_groups(), all_ard_variables()) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    19x
                    
                      
    names()

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    19x
                    
                      
  vars_protected <- setdiff(names(dat_cards), vars_ard)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    19x
                    
                      
  dat_cards_grps <- dat_cards |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-all_of(vars_protected), "..cards_idx..")

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    19x
                    
                      
  dat_cards_stats <- dat_cards |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(all_of(vars_protected))

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  # process the data/variable info

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    19x
                    
                      
  dat_cards_grps_processed <- dat_cards_grps |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    19x
                    
                      
    .check_var_nms(vars_protected = names(dat_cards_stats)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    19x
                    
                      
    rename_ard_columns(columns = all_ard_groups("names"), fill = "..cards_overall..") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    # coerce everything to character

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    19x
                    
                      
      dplyr::across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    19x
                    
                      
        -"..cards_idx..",

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    19x
                    
                      
        ~ lapply(., \(x) if (!is.null(x)) as.character(x) else NA_character_)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  # join together again

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    19x
                    
                      
  dat_cards_out <- dplyr::left_join(

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    19x
                    
                      
    dat_cards_grps_processed,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    19x
                    
                      
    dat_cards_stats,

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    19x
                    
                      
    by = "..cards_idx.."

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
