                    19x
                    
                      
  dat_cards_out <- dat_cards_out |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
    # unlist the list-columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    19x
                    
                      
    unlist_ard_columns() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    19x
                    
                      
    .fill_grps_from_variables() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    19x
                    
                      
    .fill_overall_grp_values(vars_protected) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::arrange(.data$..cards_idx..) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-"..cards_idx..")

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (trim) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    16x
                    
                      
    dat_cards_out |> .trim_ard()

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    3x
                    
                      
    dat_cards_out

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' Trim ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' This function ingests an ARD object and trims columns and rows for downstream use in

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' displays. The resulting data frame contains only numeric results, no supplemental

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' information about errors/warnings, and unnested list columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a tibble

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(ADSL, variables = "ARM")

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#'   shuffle_ard(trim = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' ard |> cards:::.trim_ard()

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
.trim_ard <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    16x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  # detect any warning/error messages and notify user

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    16x
                    
                      
  .detect_msgs(x, "warning", "error")

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  # flatten ard table for easier viewing ---------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    16x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    16x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-c("fmt_fun", "warning", "error"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' Detect Columns with Non-Null Contents

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' Function looks for non-null contents in requested columns and notifies user

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' before removal. Specifically used for detecting messages.

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... ([`dynamic-dots`][rlang::dyn-dots])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to search within

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = ARM,

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = AGE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = ~ list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'     mean = \(x) mean(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#'     mean_warning = \(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#'       warning("warn1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#'       warning("warn2")

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#'       mean(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'     },

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#'     err_fn = \(x) stop("'tis an error")

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.detect_msgs(ard, "warning", "error")

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
.detect_msgs <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    16x
                    
                      
  dots <- rlang::dots_list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    16x
                    
                      
  lapply(dots, function(var) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    32x
                    
                      
    if (any(!map_lgl(x[[var]], is.null))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    1x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_inform("{.val {var}} column contains messages that will be removed.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' Check Variable Names

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' Checks variable names in a data frame against protected names and modifies

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#' them if needed

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#' @param vars_protected (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#'   a character vector of protected names

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- data.frame(a = "x", b = "y", c = "z", ..cards_idx.. = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.check_var_nms(data, vars_protected = c("x", "z"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
.check_var_nms <- function(x, vars_protected) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
  # get all represented variable names from original data

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    19x
                    
                      
  var_nms <- x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-ends_with("_level"), -"..cards_idx..") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    19x
                    
                      
    unlist(use.names = FALSE) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    19x
                    
                      
    unique()

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
  # create uniqueness across all variables from original data & cards-specific

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
  # variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    19x
                    
                      
  var_nms_new <- make.unique(c(vars_protected, var_nms)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    19x
                    
                      
    utils::tail(n = length(var_nms)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    19x
                    
                      
    set_names(var_nms)

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
  # subset to only the ones needing recoding

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    19x
                    
                      
  var_nms_new <- var_nms_new[imap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    19x
                    
                      
    var_nms_new,

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    19x
                    
                      
    function(x, y) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    47x
                    
                      
      if (is.na(x)) FALSE else !x == y

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    19x
                    
                      
    unlist(use.names = FALSE)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
  # perform recodes if needed

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (length(var_nms_new) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    1x
                    
                      
    x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    1x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(dplyr::across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    1x
                    
                      
        -c(ends_with("_level"), "..cards_idx.."),

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    1x
                    
                      
        ~ dplyr::recode(.x, !!!var_nms_new)

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
      ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    18x
                    
                      
    x

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#' Back Fill Group Variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#' This function back fills the values of group variables using

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#' variable/variable_levels. The back filling will occur if the value of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#' `variable` column matches the name of a grouping variable, and the grouping

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#' variable's value is `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#' @return data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable = c(rep("A", 3), rep("B", 2)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable_level = 1:5,

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
#'   A = rep(NA, 5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
#'   B = rep(NA, 5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.fill_grps_from_variables(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
.fill_grps_from_variables <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
  # within each variable, check if there is a match against one of the grouping cols

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
  # if the corresponding value in that grouping col is missing, backfill with the variable level

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    19x
                    
                      
  x %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(variable = fct_inorder(.data$variable)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_by(.data$variable) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_split() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    19x
                    
                      
    map(function(dat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    34x
                    
                      
      grp_match <- names(dat)[names(dat) == unique(dat$variable)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    34x
                    
                      
      if (length(grp_match) > 0 && "variable_level" %in% names(dat)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    7x
                    
                      
        dat |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    7x
                    
                      
          dplyr::mutate(!!grp_match := ifelse(is.na(.data[[grp_match]]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    7x
                    
                      
            .data$variable_level,

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    7x
                    
                      
            .data[[grp_match]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
          ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    27x
                    
                      
        dat

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
    }) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::bind_rows() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(variable = as.character(.data$variable))

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
#' Fill Overall Group Variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
#' This function fills the missing values of grouping variables with "Overall

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
#' `variable name`" where relevant. Specifically it will modify grouping values

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
#' from rows with likely overall calculations present (e.g. non-missing

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
#' variable/variable_level, missing group variables, and evidence that the

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
#' `variable` has been computed by group in other rows). "Overall" values will

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
#' be populated only for grouping variables that have been used in other calculations

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
#' of the same variable and statistics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
#' @return data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      
#'   grp = c("AA", "AA", NA, "BB", NA),

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable = c("A", "B", "A", "C", "C"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable_level = c(1, 2, 1, 3, 3),

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
#'   A = rep(NA, 5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
#'   B = rep(NA, 5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
#'   ..cards_idx.. = c(1:5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.fill_overall_grp_values(data, vars_protected = "..cards_idx..")

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
.fill_overall_grp_values <- function(x, vars_protected) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
  # determine grouping and merging variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    19x
                    
                      
  id_vars <- c("variable", "variable_level", "stat_name", "stat_label")

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    19x
                    
                      
  id_vars <- id_vars[id_vars %in% names(x)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    19x
                    
                      
  grp_vars <- setdiff(names(x), unique(c(vars_protected, id_vars)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
  # replace NA group values with "..cards_overall.." where it is likely to be an overall calculation

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    19x
                    
                      
  for (g in grp_vars) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      
    # rows with missing group

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    20x
                    
                      
    x_missing_by <- x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    20x
                    
                      
      dplyr::filter(is.na(.data[[g]]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
    # rows with non-missing group

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    20x
                    
                      
    x_nonmissing_by <- x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    20x
                    
                      
      dplyr::filter(!is.na(.data[[g]]) & !.data[[g]] == "..cards_overall..")

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    20x
                    
                      
    if (nrow(x_missing_by) > 0 && nrow(x_nonmissing_by) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    7x
                    
                      
      x_missing_by_replaced <- x_missing_by |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    7x
                    
                      
        dplyr::rows_update(

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    7x
                    
                      
          x_nonmissing_by |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    7x
                    
                      
            dplyr::mutate(!!g := ifelse(!is.na(.data[[g]]), "..cards_overall..", .data[[g]])) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    7x
                    
                      
            dplyr::select(-any_of(c(setdiff(names(x), c(g, id_vars))))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    7x
                    
                      
            dplyr::distinct(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    7x
                    
                      
          by = id_vars,

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    7x
                    
                      
          unmatched = "ignore"

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    7x
                    
                      
      x <- dplyr::rows_update(x, x_missing_by_replaced, by = "..cards_idx..")

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
  # replace "..cards_overall.." group values with "Overall <colname>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    19x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    19x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(across(all_of(grp_vars), function(v, cur_col = dplyr::cur_column()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    20x
                    
                      
      overall_val <- make.unique(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    20x
                    
                      
        unique(v),

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    20x
                    
                      
        paste("Overall", cur_col)

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
      )) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    20x
                    
                      
        rev() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    20x
                    
                      
        .[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    20x
                    
                      
      ifelse(!is.na(v) & v == "..cards_overall..", overall_val, v)

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      
    }))

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Dichotomous ARD Statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute Analysis Results Data (ARD) for dichotomous summary statistics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ard_categorical

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of dichotomous values to tabulate. Default is `maximum_variable_value(data)`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   which returns the largest/last value after a sort.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @name ard_dichotomous

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritSection ard_categorical Denominators

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_dichotomous(mtcars, by = vs, variables = c(cyl, am), value = list(cyl = 4))

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' mtcars |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::group_by(vs) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_dichotomous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     variables = c(cyl, am),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     value = list(cyl = 4),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'     statistic = ~"p"

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_dichotomous

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
ard_dichotomous <- function(data, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    44x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    44x
                    
                      
  UseMethod("ard_dichotomous")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_dichotomous

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
ard_dichotomous.data.frame <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
                                       variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
                                       by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
                                       strata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
                                       value = maximum_variable_value(data[variables]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
                                       statistic = everything() ~ c("n", "N", "p"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
                                       denominator = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
                                       fmt_fun = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
                                       stat_label = everything() ~ default_stat_labels(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
                                       fmt_fn = deprecated(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
                                       ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    44x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  # deprecated args ------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    44x
                    
                      
  if (lifecycle::is_present(fmt_fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    lifecycle::deprecate_soft(

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
      when = "0.6.1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
      what = "ard_dichotomous(fmt_fn)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
      with = "ard_dichotomous(fmt_fun)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
    fmt_fun <- fmt_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    44x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  # process inputs -------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    44x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data, variables = {{ variables }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    44x
                    
                      
  process_formula_selectors(data[variables], value = value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    44x
                    
                      
  fill_formula_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    44x
                    
                      
    data[variables],

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    44x
                    
                      
    value = formals(asNamespace("cards")[["ard_dichotomous.data.frame"]])[["value"]] |> eval()

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    44x
                    
                      
  .check_dichotomous_value(data, value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  # return empty ARD if no variables selected ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    41x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::tibble() |> as_card())

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate summary statistics -----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    41x
                    
                      
  ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    41x
                    
                      
    data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    41x
                    
                      
    variables = all_of(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    41x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    41x
                    
                      
    strata = {{ strata }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    41x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    41x
                    
                      
    denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    41x
                    
                      
    fmt_fun = fmt_fun,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    41x
                    
                      
    stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    41x
                    
                      
    dplyr::filter(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    41x
                    
                      
      pmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    41x
                    
                      
        list(.data$variable, .data$variable_level),

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    41x
                    
                      
        function(variable, variable_level) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    460x
                    
                      
          variable_level %in% .env$value[[variable]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    41x
                    
                      
        unlist()

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    41x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "dichotomous")

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' Maximum Value

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' For each column in the passed data frame, the function returns a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' with the value being the largest/last element after a sort.

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' For factors, the last level is returned, and for logical vectors `TRUE` is returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' This is used as the default value in `ard_dichotomous(value)` if not specified by

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' the user.

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' ADSL[c("AGEGR1", "BMIBLGR1")] |> maximum_variable_value()

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
maximum_variable_value <- function(data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    79x
                    
                      
  data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    79x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    79x
                    
                      
      function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    94x
                    
                      
        if (inherits(x, "factor")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    3x
                    
                      
          return(levels(x) |> dplyr::last())

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    91x
                    
                      
        if (inherits(x, "logical")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    23x
                    
                      
          return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    68x
                    
                      
        stats::na.omit(x) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    68x
                    
                      
          unique() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    68x
                    
                      
          sort() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    68x
                    
                      
          dplyr::last()

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' Perform Value Checks

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#' Check the validity of the values passed in `ard_dichotomous(value)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#'   a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' @return returns invisible if check is successful, throws an error message if not.

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.check_dichotomous_value(mtcars, list(cyl = 4))

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
.check_dichotomous_value <- function(data, value) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    44x
                    
                      
  imap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    44x
                    
                      
    value,

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    44x
                    
                      
    function(value, column) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    55x
                    
                      
      accepted_values <- .unique_and_sorted(data[[column]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    55x
                    
                      
      if (length(value) != 1L || !value %in% accepted_values) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    3x
                    
                      
        message <- "Error in argument {.arg value} for variable {.val {column}}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    3x
                    
                      
        message <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    3x
                    
                      
          case_switch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    3x
                    
                      
            length(value) != 1L ~ c(message, "i" = "The value must be one of {.val {accepted_values}}."),

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    3x
                    
                      
            .default = c(message, "i" = "A value of {.val {value}} was passed, but must be one of {.val {accepted_values}}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    3x
                    
                      
        if (length(value) == 1L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    2x
                    
                      
          message <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    2x
                    
                      
            case_switch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    2x
                    
                      
              inherits(data[[column]], "factor") ~

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    2x
                    
                      
                c(message, i = "To summarize this value, use {.fun forcats::fct_expand} to add {.val {value}} as a level."),

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    2x
                    
                      
              .default = c(message, i = "To summarize this value, make the column a factor and include {.val {value}} as a level.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
            )

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    3x
                    
                      
        cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    3x
                    
                      
          message = message,

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    3x
                    
                      
          call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    44x
                    
                      
    invisible()

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
case_switch <- function(..., .default = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    11652x
                    
                      
  dots <- dots_list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    11652x
                    
                      
  for (f in dots) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    11657x
