      "Duplicate rows found in data for the {.val {id}} column{?s}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    2x
                    
                      
      "i" = "Percentages/Denominators are not correct."

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  # return empty ARD if no variables selected ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    96x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::tibble() |> as_card())

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
  # if denominator doesn't have all by, they need to be added ------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    95x
                    
                      
    !is.null(denominator) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    95x
                    
                      
      is.data.frame(denominator) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    95x
                    
                      
      !all(by %in% names(denominator))

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    11x
                    
                      
    by_vars_not_present <- by |> setdiff(names(denominator))

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    11x
                    
                      
    denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    11x
                    
                      
      data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    11x
                    
                      
      dplyr::select(all_of(by_vars_not_present)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    11x
                    
                      
      dplyr::distinct() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    11x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    11x
                    
                      
        ...ard_data_column... = list(denominator)

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    11x
                    
                      
      tidyr::unnest(cols = "...ard_data_column...")

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
  # add dummy variable for counting --------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    95x
                    
                      
  data[["...ard_dummy_for_counting..."]] <- 1L

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
  # perform tabulations --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    95x
                    
                      
  df_result <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    95x
                    
                      
    ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    95x
                    
                      
      data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    95x
                    
                      
      variables = "...ard_dummy_for_counting...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    95x
                    
                      
      by = all_of(by),

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    95x
                    
                      
      strata = all_of(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    95x
                    
                      
      statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    95x
                    
                      
      denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    95x
                    
                      
      fmt_fun = fmt_fun,

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    95x
                    
                      
      stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
  # renaming columns -----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    93x
                    
                      
  df_result <- .rename_last_group_as_variable(

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    93x
                    
                      
    df_result,

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    93x
                    
                      
    by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    93x
                    
                      
    variables = variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
  # return ard -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    93x
                    
                      
  df_result |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    93x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "hierarchical")

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    164

#' @rdname ard_hierarchical

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

ard_hierarchical_count.data.frame <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
                                              variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
                                              by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
                                              fmt_fun = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
                                              stat_label = everything() ~ default_stat_labels(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
                                              fmt_fn = deprecated(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
                                              ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    67x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    67x
                    
                      
  check_dots_used()

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
  # deprecated args ------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    67x
                    
                      
  if (lifecycle::is_present(fmt_fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    !
                    
                      
    lifecycle::deprecate_soft(

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    !
                    
                      
      when = "0.6.1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    !
                    
                      
      what = "ard_hierarchical_count(fmt_fn)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    !
                    
                      
      with = "ard_hierarchical_count(fmt_fun)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    !
                    
                      
    fmt_fun <- fmt_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    67x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
  # process arguments ----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    67x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data, variables = {{ variables }}, by = {{ by }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
  # return empty ARD if no variables selected ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    67x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::tibble() |> as_card())

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
  # add dummy variable for counting --------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    66x
                    
                      
  data[["...ard_dummy_for_counting..."]] <- 1L

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
  # perform tabulations --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    66x
                    
                      
  ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    66x
                    
                      
    data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    66x
                    
                      
    variables = "...ard_dummy_for_counting...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    66x
                    
                      
    by = all_of(by),

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    66x
                    
                      
    strata = all_of(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    66x
                    
                      
    statistic = everything() ~ "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    66x
                    
                      
    fmt_fun = fmt_fun,

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    66x
                    
                      
    stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    66x
                    
                      
    .rename_last_group_as_variable(by = by, variables = variables) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    66x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "hierarchical_count") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    66x
                    
                      
    as_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' Rename Last Group to Variable

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#' In the `ard_hierarchical*()` functions, the last grouping variable is

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#' renamed to `variable` and `variable_level` before being returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df_result (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- data.frame(x = 1, y = 2, group1 = 3, group2 = 4)

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.rename_last_group_as_variable(data, by = "ARM", variables = "AESOC")

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
.rename_last_group_as_variable <- function(df_result, by, variables) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    159x
                    
                      
  df_result |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    159x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-all_ard_variables()) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    159x
                    
                      
    dplyr::rename(

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    159x
                    
                      
      variable = all_ard_group_n(n = length(c(by, variables)), types = "names"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    159x
                    
                      
      variable_level = all_ard_group_n(

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    159x
                    
                      
        n = length(c(by, variables)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    159x
                    
                      
        types = "levels"

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD Attributes

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Add variable attributes to an ARD data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' - The `label` attribute will be added for all columns, and when no label

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   is specified and no label has been set for a column using the `label=` argument,

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   the column name will be placed in the label statistic.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' - The `class` attribute will also be returned for all columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' - Any other attribute returned by `attributes()` will also be added, e.g. factor levels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_attributes

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variables ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables to include

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param label (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of variable labels, e.g. `list(cyl = "No. Cylinders")`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `NULL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams rlang::args_dots_empty

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @name ard_attributes

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' df <- dplyr::tibble(var1 = letters, var2 = LETTERS)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' attr(df$var1, "label") <- "Lowercase Letters"

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_attributes(df, variables = everything())

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_attributes

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
ard_attributes <- function(data, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    12x
                    
                      
  UseMethod("ard_attributes")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_attributes

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
ard_attributes.data.frame <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
                                      variables = everything(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
                                      label = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
                                      ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    11x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    11x
                    
                      
  check_dots_used()

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    11x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    11x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    11x
                    
                      
  check_dots_empty()

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  # process arguments ----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    11x
                    
                      
  data <- dplyr::ungroup(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    11x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data, variables = {{ variables }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  # return empty ARD if no variables selected ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    11x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::tibble() |> as_card())

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  # check label is a named list ------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    11x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(label)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    3x
                    
                      
    if (!is.list(label) || !is_named(label) || some(label, \(x) !is_string(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
        "The {.arg label} argument must be a named list with each element a string.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
        call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    10x
                    
                      
  variables |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    10x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    10x
                    
                      
      FUN = function(y) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    25x
                    
                      
        attr <- attributes(data[[y]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
        # add/update variable label

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    25x
                    
                      
        attr[["label"]] <- label[[y]] %||% attr[["label"]] %||% y

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
        # attributes() doesn't always return class, adding it if not already present

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    25x
                    
                      
        attr[["class"]] <- attr[["class"]] %||% class(data[[y]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    25x
                    
                      
        dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    25x
                    
                      
          variable = .env$y,

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    25x
                    
                      
          stat_name = names(attr),

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    25x
                    
                      
          stat = unname(attr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    10x
                    
                      
    dplyr::bind_rows() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    10x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    10x
                    
                      
      stat_label = dplyr::case_when(

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    10x
                    
                      
        .data$stat_name %in% "label" ~ "Variable Label",

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    10x
                    
                      
        .data$stat_name %in% "class" ~ "Variable Class",

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    10x
                    
                      
        TRUE ~ .data$stat_name

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    10x
                    
                      
      context = "attributes",

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    10x
                    
                      
      fmt_fun = ifelse(.data$stat_name %in% "label", list(as.character), list(NULL)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    10x
                    
                      
      warning = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    10x
                    
                      
      error = list(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    10x
                    
                      
    cards::tidy_ard_column_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    10x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_row_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    10x
                    
                      
    as_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_attributes

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
ard_attributes.default <- function(data, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    1x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    1x
                    
                      
  cli::cli_abort("There is no method for objects of class {.cls {class(data)}}.", call = get_cli_abort_call())

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Check ARD Structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Function tests the structure and returns notes when object does not

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' conform to expected structure.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param column_order (scalar `logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   check whether ordering of columns adheres to to `cards::tidy_ard_column_order()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param method (scalar `logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   check whether a `"stat_name"` equal to `"method"` appears in results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card' (invisible)

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(ADSL, variables = "AGE") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::select(-warning, -error) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   check_ard_structure()

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
check_ard_structure <- function(x, column_order = TRUE, method = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    10x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(method)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(column_order)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  # check class ----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!inherits(x, "card")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform("Object is not of class {.cls card}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  # exit if not a data frame ---------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!inherits(x, "data.frame")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    !
                    
                      
    return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  # check expected variables are present ---------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    10x
                    
                      
  missing_variables <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    10x
                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    10x
                    
                      
      "variable", "stat_name", "stat_label", "stat",

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    10x
                    
                      
      "fmt_fun", "warning", "error"

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    10x
                    
                      
    setdiff(names(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(missing_variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform("The following columns are not present: {.val {missing_variables}}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  # check whether AR contains a method stat ------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(method)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!"method" %in% x$stat_name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_inform("Expecting a row with {.code stat_name = 'method'}, but it is not present.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  # check order of columns -----------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(column_order)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    10x
                    
                      
    if (!identical(names(x), names(tidy_ard_column_order(x)))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
      cli::cli_inform(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
        c("The column order is not in the standard order.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
          i = "Use {.fun cards::tidy_ard_column_order} for standard ordering."

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  # check columns are list columns as expected ---------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    10x
                    
                      
  expected_lst_columns <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    10x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    10x
                    
                      
      x, all_ard_groups(), all_ard_variables(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    10x
                    
                      
      any_of(c("stat", "fmt_fun", "warning", "error"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    # remove group## and variable columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    10x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-matches("^group[0-9]$"), -"variable") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    10x
                    
                      
    names()

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    10x
                    
                      
  not_a_lst_columns <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    10x
                    
                      
    x[expected_lst_columns] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    10x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-where(is.list)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    10x
                    
                      
    names()

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(not_a_lst_columns)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform("The following columns are expected to be list columns: {.val {not_a_lst_columns}}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    10x
                    
                      
  invisible(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Apply Formatting Functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Apply the formatting functions to each of the raw statistics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Function aliases are converted to functions using [alias_as_fmt_fun()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param replace (scalar `logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to replace values in the `'stat_fmt'` column (if present).

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(ADSL, variables = "AGE") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fun()

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
apply_fmt_fun <- function(x, replace = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    31x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    31x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, cls = "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    30x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(replace)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  # add stat_fmt if not already present, if replace is TRUE overwrite existing stat_fmt column

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    30x
                    
                      
  if (!"stat_fmt" %in% names(x) || isTRUE(replace)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    29x
                    
                      
    x <- x |> dplyr::mutate(.after = "stat", stat_fmt = list(NULL))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    30x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    30x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    30x
                    
                      
      stat_fmt =

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    30x
                    
                      
        pmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    30x
                    
                      
          list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    30x
                    
                      
            .data$stat,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    30x
                    
                      
            .data$variable,

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    30x
                    
                      
            .data$stat_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    30x
                    
                      
            .data$fmt_fun,

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    30x
                    
                      
            .data$stat_fmt

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
          ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    30x
                    
                      
          function(stat, variable, stat_name, fn, stat_fmt) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    203x
                    
                      
            if (!is.null(fn) && is.null(stat_fmt)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    201x
                    
                      
              tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    201x
                    
                      
                do.call(alias_as_fmt_fun(fn, variable, stat_name), args = list(stat)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    201x
                    
                      
                error = \(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    2x
                    
                      
                  cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    2x
                    
                      
                    c("There was an error applying the formatting function to

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    2x
                    
                      
                       statistic {.val {stat_name}} for variable {.val {variable}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    2x
                    
                      
                      "i" = "Perhaps try formmatting function {.fun as.character}? See error message below:",

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    2x
                    
                      
                      "x" = conditionMessage(e)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
                    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    2x
                    
                      
                    call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
                  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
                }

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
              )

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
            } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    2x
                    
                      
              stat_fmt

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert Alias to Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' Accepted aliases are non-negative integers and strings.

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' The integers are converted to functions that round the statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' to the number of decimal places to match the integer.

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' The formatting strings come in the form `"xx"`, `"xx.x"`, `"xx.x%"`, etc.

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' The number of `x`s that appear after the decimal place indicate the number of

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' decimal places the statistics will be rounded to.

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' The number of `x`s that appear before the decimal place indicate the leading

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' spaces that are added to the result.

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' If the string ends in `"%"`, results are scaled by 100 before rounding.

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`integer`, `string`, or `function`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'   a non-negative integer, string alias, or function

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variable (`character`)\cr the variable whose statistic is to be formatted

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' @param stat_name (`character`)\cr the name of the statistic that is to be formatted

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a function

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' alias_as_fmt_fun(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' alias_as_fmt_fun("xx.x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
alias_as_fmt_fun <- function(x, variable, stat_name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    205x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    205x
                    
                      
  if (is.function(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    86x
                    
                      
    return(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    119x
                    
                      
  if (is_integerish(x) && x >= 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    104x
                    
                      
    return(label_round(digits = as.integer(x)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (is_string(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    13x
                    
                      
    .check_fmt_string(x, variable, stat_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    12x
                    
                      
    scale <- ifelse(endsWith(x, "%"), 100, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    12x
                    
                      
    decimal_n <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    12x
                    
                      
      ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    12x
                    
                      
        !grepl("\\.", x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    12x
                    
                      
        0L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    12x
                    
                      
        gsub("%", "", x) |> # remove percent sign if it is there

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    12x
