      lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    592
                    3x
                    
                      
        variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    593
                    3x
                    
                      
        function(variable) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    594
                    5x
                    
                      
          dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    595
                    5x
                    
                      
            ...ard_N... =

                    		
                  

                  

                    596
                    5x
                    
                      
              tidyr::drop_na(data, all_of(c(by, strata, variable))) |> nrow()

                    		
                  

                  

                    597
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    598
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    599
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    600
                    3x
                    
                      
      stats::setNames(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    601
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    602
                    
                    
                      
  # if user requested row percentages

                    		
                  

                  

                    603
                    40x
                    
                      
  else if (isTRUE(denominator %in% "row")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    604
                    36x
                    
                      
    lst_denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    605
                    36x
                    
                      
      lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    606
                    36x
                    
                      
        variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    607
                    36x
                    
                      
        function(variable) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    608
                    66x
                    
                      
          .table_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    609
                    66x
                    
                      
            data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    610
                    66x
                    
                      
            variable = variable,

                    		
                  

                  

                    611
                    66x
                    
                      
            by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    612
                    66x
                    
                      
            strata = strata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    613
                    66x
                    
                      
            count_column = "...ard_N...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    614
                    66x
                    
                      
            useNA = "always"

                    		
                  

                  

                    615
                    
                    
                      
          ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    616
                    66x
                    
                      
            tidyr::drop_na(all_of(c(by, strata, variable))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    617
                    66x
                    
                      
            dplyr::summarise(

                    		
                  

                  

                    618
                    66x
                    
                      
              .by = all_of(variable),

                    		
                  

                  

                    619
                    66x
                    
                      
              ...ard_N... = sum(.data$...ard_N...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    620
                    
                    
                      
            )

                    		
                  

                  

                    621
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    622
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    623
                    36x
                    
                      
      stats::setNames(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    624
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    625
                    
                    
                      
  # if user passed a single integer

                    		
                  

                  

                    626
                    4x
                    
                      
  else if (is_scalar_integerish(denominator)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    627
                    1x
                    
                      
    lst_denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    628
                    1x
                    
                      
      rep_named(

                    		
                  

                  

                    629
                    1x
                    
                      
        variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    630
                    1x
                    
                      
        list(dplyr::tibble(...ard_N... = as.integer(denominator)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    631
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    632
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    633
                    
                    
                      
  # if user passed a data frame WITH the counts pre-specified

                    		
                  

                  

                    634
                    3x
                    
                      
  else if (is.data.frame(denominator) && "...ard_N..." %in% names(denominator)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    635
                    
                    
                      
    # check there are no duplicates in by/strata variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    636
                    
                    
                      
    if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    637
                    3x
                    
                      
      (any(c(by, strata) %in% names(denominator)) && any(duplicated(denominator[c(by, strata)]))) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    638
                    3x
                    
                      
        (!any(c(by, strata) %in% names(denominator)) && nrow(denominator) > 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    639
                    
                    
                      
    ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    640
                    1x
                    
                      
      paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    641
                    1x
                    
                      
        "Specified counts in column {.val '...ard_N...'} are not unique in",

                    		
                  

                  

                    642
                    1x
                    
                      
        "the {.arg denominator} argument across the {.arg by} and {.arg strata} columns."

                    		
                  

                  

                    643
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    644
                    1x
                    
                      
        cli::cli_abort(call = get_cli_abort_call())

                    		
                  

                  

                    645
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    646
                    2x
                    
                      
    .check_for_missing_combos_in_denom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    647
                    2x
                    
                      
      data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    648
                    2x
                    
                      
      denominator = denominator, by = by, strata = strata

                    		
                  

                  

                    649
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    650
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    651
                    
                    
                      
    # making the by/strata columns character to merge them with the count data frames

                    		
                  

                  

                    652
                    1x
                    
                      
    df_denom <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    653
                    1x
                    
                      
      denominator |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    654
                    1x
                    
                      
      dplyr::select(any_of(c(by, strata, "...ard_N..."))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    655
                    1x
                    
                      
      tidyr::drop_na() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    656
                    1x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(across(any_of(c(by, strata)), as.character))

                    		
                  

                  

                    657
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    658
                    1x
                    
                      
    lst_denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    659
                    1x
                    
                      
      rep_named(variables, list(df_denom))

                    		
                  

                  

                    660
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    661
                    !
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort("The {.arg denominator} argument has been mis-specified.", call = get_cli_abort_call())

                    		
                  

                  

                    662
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    663
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    664
                    323x
                    
                      
  lst_denominator

                    		
                  

                  

                    665
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    666
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    667
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    668
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    669
                    
                    
                      
#' Check for Missing Levels in `denominator`

                    		
                  

                  

                    670
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    671
                    
                    
                      
#' When a user passes a data frame in the `denominator` argument, this function

                    		
                  

                  

                    672
                    
                    
                      
#' checks that the data frame contains all the same levels of the `by`

                    		
                  

                  

                    673
                    
                    
                      
#' and `strata` variables that appear in `data`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    674
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    675
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    676
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    677
                    
                    
                      
#' @param denominator (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    678
                    
                    
                      
#'   denominator data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    679
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    680
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of by column names

                    		
                  

                  

                    681
                    
                    
                      
#' @param strata (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    682
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of strata column names

                    		
                  

                  

                    683
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    684
                    
                    
                      
#' @return returns invisible if check is successful, throws an error message if not.

                    		
                  

                  

                    685
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    686
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    687
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    688
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.check_for_missing_combos_in_denom(ADSL, denominator = "col", by = "ARM", strata = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    689
                    
                    
                      
.check_for_missing_combos_in_denom <- function(data, denominator, by, strata) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    690
                    83x
                    
                      
  by_vars_to_check <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    691
                    83x
                    
                      
    c(by, strata) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    692
                    83x
                    
                      
    intersect(names(data)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    693
                    83x
                    
                      
    intersect(names(denominator))

                    		
                  

                  

                    694
                    83x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(by_vars_to_check)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    695
                    !
                    
                      
    return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    696
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    697
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    698
                    
                    
                      
  # find missing combinations

                    		
                  

                  

                    699
                    83x
                    
                      
  df_denom_level_check <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    700
                    83x
                    
                      
    dplyr::anti_join(

                    		
                  

                  

                    701
                    83x
                    
                      
      data[by_vars_to_check] |> unique(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    702
                    83x
                    
                      
      denominator[by_vars_to_check] |> unique(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    703
                    83x
                    
                      
      by_vars_to_check

                    		
                  

                  

                    704
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    705
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    706
                    
                    
                      
  # message users of missing combination

                    		
                  

                  

                    707
                    83x
                    
                      
  if (nrow(df_denom_level_check) > 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    708
                    2x
                    
                      
    missing_combos <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    709
                    2x
                    
                      
      df_denom_level_check |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    710
                    2x
                    
                      
      unique() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    711
                    2x
                    
                      
      imap(~ glue::glue("{.y} ({.x})")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    712
                    2x
                    
                      
      dplyr::bind_cols() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    713
                    2x
                    
                      
      as.matrix() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    714
                    2x
                    
                      
      apply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    715
                    2x
                    
                      
        MARGIN = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    716
                    2x
                    
                      
        FUN = function(x) paste(x, collapse = "/"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    717
                    2x
                    
                      
        simplify = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    718
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    719
                    2x
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    720
                    2x
                    
                      
      "The following {.arg by/strata} combinations are missing from the",

                    		
                  

                  

                    721
                    2x
                    
                      
      "{.arg denominator} data frame: {.val {missing_combos}}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    722
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    723
                    2x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_abort(call = get_cli_abort_call())

                    		
                  

                  

                    724
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    725
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluate and Capture Conditions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' **`eval_capture_conditions()`**

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluates an expression while also capturing error and warning conditions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' Function always returns a named list `list(result=, warning=, error=)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' If there are no errors or warnings, those elements will be `NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' If there is an error, the result element will be `NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' Messages are neither saved nor printed to the console.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluation is done via [`rlang::eval_tidy()`]. If errors and warnings are produced

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' using the `{cli}` package, the messages are processed with `cli::ansi_strip()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' to remove styling from the message.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' **`captured_condition_as_message()`/`captured_condition_as_error()`**

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' These functions take the result from `eval_capture_conditions()` and return

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' errors or warnings as either messages (via `cli::cli_inform()`) or

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' errors (via `cli::cli_abort()`). These functions handle cases where the

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' condition messages may include curly brackets, which would typically cause

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' issues when processed with the `cli::cli_*()` functions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' Functions return the `"result"` from `eval_capture_conditions()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams rlang::eval_tidy

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams cli::cli_abort

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`captured_condition`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   a captured condition created by `eval_capture_conditions()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param type (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   the type of condition to return. Must be one of `'error'` or `'warning'`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @param message (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   message passed to `cli::cli_inform()` or `cli::cli_abort()`. The condition

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   being printed is saved in an object named `condition`, which should be

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   included in this message surrounded by curly brackets.

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @param call (`environment`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   Execution environment of currently running function. Default is

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   `get_cli_abort_call()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @name eval_capture_conditions

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' # function executes without error or warning

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' eval_capture_conditions(letters[1:2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' # an error is thrown

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' res <- eval_capture_conditions(stop("Example Error!"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' res

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' captured_condition_as_message(res)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' # if more than one warning is returned, all are saved

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' eval_capture_conditions({

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'   warning("Warning 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'   warning("Warning 2")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   letters[1:2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' })

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' # messages are not printed to the console

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' eval_capture_conditions({

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'   message("A message!")

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'   letters[1:2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' })

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname eval_capture_conditions

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
eval_capture_conditions <- function(expr, data = NULL, env = caller_env()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  # IF WE EVER NEED TO REWORK/DEBUG REVIEW THE ADVANCED R CONDITIONS CHAPTER

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  # https://adv-r.hadley.nz/conditions.html#conditions

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  # initialize empty list to return

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    10209x
                    
                      
  lst_result <- list(result = NULL, warning = NULL, error = NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # tryCatch() saves error messages

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  # withCallingHandlers() saves the warnings

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  # invokeRestart() suppresses the printing of warnings when code is resumed

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    10209x
                    
                      
  tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    10209x
                    
                      
    withCallingHandlers(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    10209x
                    
                      
      expr = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    10209x
                    
                      
        lst_result[["result"]] <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    10209x
                    
                      
          suppressMessages(eval_tidy({{ expr }}, data = data, env = env))

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
      },

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    10209x
                    
                      
      warning = function(w) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    20x
                    
                      
        lst_result[["warning"]] <<-

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
          # using `c()` to capture all warnings

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    20x
                    
                      
          c(lst_result[["warning"]], conditionMessage(w) |> cli::ansi_strip())

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    20x
                    
                      
        invokeRestart("muffleWarning")

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    10209x
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    19x
                    
                      
      lst_result[["error"]] <<- conditionMessage(e) |> cli::ansi_strip()

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  # return named list of results

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    10209x
                    
                      
  lst_result %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    10209x
                    
                      
    structure(., class = c("captured_condition", class(.)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname eval_capture_conditions

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
captured_condition_as_message <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
                                          message =

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
                                            c("The following {type} occured:",

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
                                              "x" = "{condition}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
                                            ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
                                          type = c("error", "warning"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
                                          envir = rlang::current_env()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "captured_condition")

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    3x
                    
                      
  type <- rlang::arg_match(type)

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  # if error/warning is empty, return x invisibly

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(x[[type]])) return(x[["result"]]) # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    2x
                    
                      
  condition <- x[[type]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    2x
                    
                      
  cli::cli_inform(message = message, .envir = envir)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    2x
                    
                      
  x[["result"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname eval_capture_conditions

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
captured_condition_as_error <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
                                        message =

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
                                          c("The following {type} occured:",

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
                                            "x" = "{condition}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
                                          ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
                                        type = c("error", "warning"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
                                        call = get_cli_abort_call(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
                                        envir = rlang::current_env()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    9x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "captured_condition")

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    9x
                    
                      
  type <- rlang::arg_match(type)

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
  # if error/warning is empty, return x invisibly

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(x[[type]])) return(x[["result"]]) # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    3x
                    
                      
  condition <- x[[type]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    3x
                    
                      
  cli::cli_abort(message = message, call = call, .envir = envir)

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Argument Values ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Place default and passed argument values to a function into an ARD structure.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fun (`function`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   a [function] passed to `formals(fun)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arg_names (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of argument names to return

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param passed_args (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   a named list of user-passed arguments. Default is `list()`, which returns

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   all default values from a function

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param envir (`environment`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   an environment passed to `formals(envir)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an partial ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' # Example 1 ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' # add the `mcnemar.test(correct)` argument to an ARD structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_formals(fun = mcnemar.test, arg_names = "correct")

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' # Example 2 ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' # S3 Methods need special handling to access the underlying method

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_formals(

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   fun = asNamespace("stats")[["t.test.default"]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   arg_names = c("mu", "paired", "var.equal", "conf.level"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   passed_args = list(conf.level = 0.90)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
ard_formals <- function(fun, arg_names, passed_args = list(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
                        envir = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    2x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(fun)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(arg_names)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_class(passed_args, "list")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_class(fun, "function")

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_class(arg_names, "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_class(envir, "environment")

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  # prepare named list of arguments --------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    2x
                    
                      
  lst_args <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    2x
                    
                      
    formals(fun = fun, envir = envir)[arg_names] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    2x
                    
                      
    utils::modifyList(val = passed_args[intersect(arg_names, names(passed_args))], keep.null = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  # put formals list in ARD structure ------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    2x
                    
                      
  enframe(lst_args[arg_names], "stat_name", "stat") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    2x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(stat_label = .data$stat_name, .after = "stat_name") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    2x
                    
                      
    as_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD-flavor of unique()

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Essentially a wrapper for `unique(x) |> sort()` with `NA` levels removed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' For factors, all levels are returned even if they are unobserved.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Similarly, logical vectors always return `c(TRUE, FALSE)`, even if

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' both levels are not observed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`any`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   a vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.unique_and_sorted(factor(letters[c(5, 5:1)], levels = letters))

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.unique_and_sorted(c(FALSE, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.unique_and_sorted(c(5, 5:1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
.unique_and_sorted <- function(x, useNA = c("no", "always")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    1691x
                    
                      
  useNA <- match.arg(useNA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  # if a factor return a factor that includes the same levels (including unobserved levels)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    1691x
                    
                      
  if (inherits(x, "factor")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    48x
                    
                      
    return(

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    48x
                    
                      
      factor(

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    48x
                    
                      
        if (useNA == "no") levels(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    48x
                    
                      
        else c(levels(x), NA_character_),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    48x
                    
                      
        levels = levels(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    1643x
                    
                      
  if (inherits(x, "logical")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    58x
                    
                      
    if (useNA == "no") return(c(FALSE, TRUE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    5x
                    
                      
    else return(c(FALSE, TRUE, NA))

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
  # otherwise, return a simple unique and sort of the vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    1140x
                    
                      
  if (useNA == "no") return(unique(x) |> sort())

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    440x
                    
                      
  else return(unique(x) |> sort() |> c(NA))

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  # styler: on

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' Named List Predicate

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' A predicate function to check whether input is a named list and _not_ a data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`any`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   object to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a logical

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.is_named_list(list(a = 1:3))

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
.is_named_list <- function(x, allow_df = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    14224x
                    
                      
  if (isFALSE(allow_df)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    4038x
                    
                      
    return(is.list(x) && is_named(x) && !is.data.frame(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    10186x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(allow_df)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    10186x
                    
                      
    return(is.list(x) && is_named(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' A list_flatten()-like Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' Function operates similarly to `purrr::list_flatten(x, name_spec = "{inner}")`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'   a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- list(a = 1, b = list(b1 = 2, b2 = 3), c = list(c1 = 4, c2 = list(c2a = 5)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.purrr_list_flatten(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
.purrr_list_flatten <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1911x
                    
                      
  ret <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1911x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1285x
                    
                      
    if (.is_named_list(x[[i]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1283x
                    
                      
      ret <- append(ret, values = x[[i]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    2x
                    
                      
      ret <- append(ret, values = x[i])

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    1911x
                    
                      
  ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Pairwise ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Utility to perform pairwise comparisons.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variable ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   Column to perform pairwise analyses for.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .f (`function`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   a function that creates ARDs. The function accepts a single argument and

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   a subset of `data` will be passed including the two levels of `variable`
