                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   for the pairwise analysis.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param include (`vector`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   a vector of levels of the `variable` column to include in comparisons.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   Pairwise comparisons will only be performed for pairs that have a level

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   specified here. Default is `NULL` and all pairwise computations are included.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return list of ARDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_pairwise(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable = ARM,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   .f = \(df) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'     ard_complex(

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'       df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'       variables = AGE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'       statistic = ~ list(ttest = \(x, data, ...) t.test(x ~ data$ARM)[c("statistic", "p.value")])

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'     )

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   },

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   include = "Placebo" # only include comparisons to the "Placebo" group

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
ard_pairwise <- function(data, variable, .f, include = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    8x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    8x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    8x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data, variable = {{ variable }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    7x
                    
                      
  check_scalar(variable)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(include) && (!is_vector(include) || is.list(include))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1x
                    
                      
      "The {.arg include} argument must be a simple vector, not {.obj_type_friendly {include}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    1x
                    
                      
      call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    5x
                    
                      
  .f <- as_function(.f, call = get_cli_abort_call())

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    5x
                    
                      
  variable_levels <- .unique_and_sorted(data[[variable]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(include)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    3x
                    
                      
    if (!all(include %in% variable_levels)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1x
                    
                      
        "The {.arg include} argument must be NULL or one or more of {.val {variable_levels}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    1x
                    
                      
        call = get_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    4x
                    
                      
  include <- include %||% variable_levels # if include not specified, default to all levels

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  # identify all pairwise values in `variable` ---------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    4x
                    
                      
  mtx_pairs <- variable_levels |> utils::combn(m = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    4x
                    
                      
  lst_pairs <- seq_len(ncol(mtx_pairs)) |> lapply(FUN = \(x) mtx_pairs[, x])

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    4x
                    
                      
  lst_pairs <- lst_pairs[map_lgl(lst_pairs, ~ any(.x %in% include))] # exclude pairs that were not requested

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  # create data subsets including the pairs ------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    4x
                    
                      
  lst_df_subsets <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    4x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    4x
                    
                      
      lst_pairs,

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    4x
                    
                      
      FUN = \(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    8x
                    
                      
        df_subset <- data |> dplyr::filter(.data[[variable]] %in% .env$x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    8x
                    
                      
        if (is.factor(data[[variable]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    1x
                    
                      
          data[[variable]] <- factor(data[[variable]], ordered = is.ordered(data[[variable]]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    8x
                    
                      
        df_subset

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
    # set names for returned list including the pair levels

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    4x
                    
                      
    stats::setNames(map_chr(lst_pairs, ~ as.character(.x) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    4x
                    
                      
      shQuote(type = "csh") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    4x
                    
                      
      paste(collapse = " vs. ")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  # perform analysis -----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    4x
                    
                      
  lst_ard <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    4x
                    
                      
    imap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    4x
                    
                      
      lst_df_subsets,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    4x
                    
                      
      \(df, pairs) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    6x
                    
                      
        eval_capture_conditions(.f(df)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    6x
                    
                      
          captured_condition_as_error(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    6x
                    
                      
            message = c(glue::glue("The following {{type}} occurred for {pairs}. See message below."), x = "{condition}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  # return result --------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    3x
                    
                      
  lst_ard

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD Identity

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Function ingests pre-calculated statistics and returns the identical results,

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' but in an ARD format.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (named `list`/`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of results or a data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   Names are the statistic names, and the values

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   are the statistic values. These comprise the `"stat_name"` and `"stat"`

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns in the returned ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variable (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   string of a variable name that is assigned to the `"variable"` column in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param context (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   string to be added to the `"context"` column. Default is `"identity"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @returns a ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' t.test(formula = AGE ~ 1, data = ADSL)[c("statistic", "parameter", "p.value")] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_identity(variable = "AGE", context = "onesample_t_test")

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
ard_identity <- function(x, variable, context = "identity") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    4x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, c("list", "data.frame"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_named(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_string(variable)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_string(context)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  # build data frame for calculation -------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    3x
                    
                      
  dplyr::tibble("{variable}" := TRUE) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    3x
                    
                      
    ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    3x
                    
                      
      variables = all_of(variable),

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    3x
                    
                      
      statistic = everything() ~ list(identity = \(xxx) x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    3x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    3x
                    
                      
      context = .env$context

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Rename ARD Group Columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Functions for renaming group columns names in ARDs.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'  an ARD data frame of class 'card'.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param shift (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'  an integer specifying how many values to shift the group IDs,

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'  e.g. `shift=-1` renames `group2` to `group1`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @name rename_ard_groups

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_continuous(ADSL, by = c(SEX, ARM), variables = AGE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' # Example 1 ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' rename_ard_groups_shift(ard, shift = -1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' # Example 2 ----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' rename_ard_groups_reverse(ard)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname rename_ard_groups

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
rename_ard_groups_shift <- function(x, shift = -1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    18x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    18x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    18x
                    
                      
  check_integerish(shift)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  # create data frame with old names and new names -----------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    18x
                    
                      
  df_group_names <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    18x
                    
                      
    .group_names_as_df(x) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    18x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    18x
                    
                      
      new_group_id = .data$old_group_id + as.integer(.env$shift),

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    18x
                    
                      
      new_group_name =

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    18x
                    
                      
        pmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    18x
                    
                      
          list(.data$old_group_name, .data$old_group_id, .data$new_group_id),

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    18x
                    
                      
          \(old_group_name, old_group_id, new_group_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    76x
                    
                      
            str_replace(

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    76x
                    
                      
              old_group_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    76x
                    
                      
              pattern = paste0("^group", old_group_id),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    76x
                    
                      
              replacement = paste0("group", new_group_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
            )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
        ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    18x
                    
                      
          as.character()

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  # warn about bad names

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    18x
                    
                      
  if (any(df_group_names$new_group_id < 1L)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform(c("There are now non-standard group column names:

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1x
                    
                      
                    {.val {df_group_names$new_group_name[df_group_names$new_group_id < 1L]}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
      "i" = "Is this the shift you had planned?"

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  # rename columns and return ARD ----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    18x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    18x
                    
                      
    dplyr::rename(!!!deframe(df_group_names[c("new_group_name", "old_group_name")]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname rename_ard_groups

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
rename_ard_groups_reverse <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    2x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    2x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  # if no groups, return ARD unaltered -----------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    2x
                    
                      
  if (dplyr::select(x, all_ard_groups()) |> names() |> is_empty()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # create data frame with old names and new names -----------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
  df_group_names <- .group_names_as_df(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
  all_obs_ids <- sort(unique(df_group_names$old_group_id))

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    1x
                    
                      
  df_group_names$new_group_id <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::recode(

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
      df_group_names$old_group_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
      !!!set_names(all_obs_ids, rev(all_obs_ids))

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
  df_group_names$new_group_name <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1x
                    
                      
    pmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
      list(df_group_names$old_group_name, df_group_names$old_group_id, df_group_names$new_group_id),

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
      \(old_group_name, old_group_id, new_group_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    4x
                    
                      
        str_replace(

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    4x
                    
                      
          old_group_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    4x
                    
                      
          pattern = paste0("^group", old_group_id),

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    4x
                    
                      
          replacement = paste0("group", new_group_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    1x
                    
                      
    as.character()

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
  # rename columns and return ARD ----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    1x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::rename(!!!deframe(df_group_names[c("new_group_name", "old_group_name")])) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    1x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_column_order()

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
.group_names_as_df <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    19x
                    
                      
  dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    19x
                    
                      
    old_group_name = dplyr::select(x, all_ard_groups()) |> names(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    19x
                    
                      
    old_group_id =

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    19x
                    
                      
      str_extract(.data$old_group_name, "^group[0-9]+") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    19x
                    
                      
        str_remove("^group") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    19x
                    
                      
        as.integer()

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Data Frame as ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert data frames to ARDs of class 'card'.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   stat_name = c("N", "mean"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   stat_label = c("N", "Mean"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   stat = c(10, 0.5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   as_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
as_card <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    844x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  # check in inputs ------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    844x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, cls = "data.frame")

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  # convert to class "card" ----------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    841x
                    
                      
  if (inherits(x, "card")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    196x
                    
                      
    x

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    645x
                    
                      
    structure(x, class = c("card", class(x)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Replace NULL Statistics with Specified Value

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' When a statistical summary function errors, the `"stat"` column will be

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `NULL`. It is, however, sometimes useful to replace these values with a

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' non-`NULL` value, e.g. `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value (usually a `scalar`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   The value to replace `NULL` values with. Default is `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rows ([`data-masking`][rlang::args_data_masking])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   Expression that return a logical value, and are defined in terms of the variables in `.data`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   Only rows for which the condition evaluates to `TRUE` are replaced.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `TRUE`, which applies to all rows.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' # the quantile functions error because the input is character, while the median function returns NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' data.frame(x = rep_len(NA_character_, 10)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'     variables = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'     statistic = ~ continuous_summary_fns(c("median", "p25", "p75"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   replace_null_statistic(rows = !is.null(error))

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
replace_null_statistic <- function(x, value = NA, rows = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    1x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    1x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  # replace NULL values --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    1x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::rowwise() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
      # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    1x
                    
                      
      stat =

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    1x
                    
                      
        if (is.null(.data$stat) && {{ rows }}) list(.env$value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    1x
                    
                      
        else list(.data$stat)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
      # styler: on

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    # restore previous grouping structure and original class of x

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_by(dplyr::pick(dplyr::group_vars(x))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1x
                    
                      
    structure(class = class(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Rounding of Numbers

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Rounds the values in its first argument to the specified number of

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' decimal places (default 0). Importantly, `round5()` **does not** use Base R's

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' "round to even" default. Standard rounding methods are implemented, for example,

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `cards::round5(0.5) = 1`, whereas `base::round(0.5) = 0`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' Function inspired by `janitor::round_half_up()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`numeric`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   a numeric vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param digits (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   integer indicating the number of decimal places

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a numeric vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- 0:4 / 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' round5(x) |> setNames(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' # compare results to Base R

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' round(x) |> setNames(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
round5 <- function(x, digits = 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    296x
                    
                      
  trunc(abs(x) * 10^digits + 0.5 + sqrt(.Machine$double.eps)) / 10^digits * sign(as.numeric(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Build ARD from Tidier

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `r lifecycle::badge("questioning")`\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' *Function is questioning because we think a better solution may be `ard_continuous()` + `ard_formals()`.*

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' Function converts a model's one-row tidy data frame into an ARD structure.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' The tidied data frame must have been constructed with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' [eval_capture_conditions()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' This function is primarily for developers and few consistency checks have

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' been included.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lst_tidy (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   list of tidied results constructed with [eval_capture_conditions()],

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   e.g. `eval_capture_conditions(t.test(mtcars$mpg ~ mtcars$am) |> broom::tidy())`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tidy_result_names (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of column names expected by the

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   tidier method. This is used to construct blank results in the event of an error.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fun_args_to_record (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of function argument names that are added to the ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param formals (`pairlist`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   the results from `formals()`, e.g. `formals(fisher.test)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   This is used to get the default argument values from unspecified arguments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param passed_args (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of additional arguments passed to the modeling function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lst_ard_columns (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of values that will be added to the ARD data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' # example how one may create a fisher.test() ARD function

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' my_ard_fishertest <- function(data, by, variable, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   # perform fisher test and format results -----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   lst_tidy_fisher <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'     eval_capture_conditions(

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'       # this manipulation is similar to `fisher.test(...) |> broom::tidy()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'       stats::fisher.test(x = data[[variable]], y = data[[by]], ...)[c("p.value", "method")] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'         as.data.frame()

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'     )

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   # build ARD ------------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   tidy_as_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'     lst_tidy = lst_tidy_fisher,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'     tidy_result_names = c("p.value", "method"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'     fun_args_to_record =

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'       c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'         "workspace", "hybrid", "hybridPars", "control", "or",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'         "conf.int", "conf.level", "simulate.p.value", "B"

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'       ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'     formals = formals(stats::fisher.test),

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'     passed_args = dots_list(...),

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'     lst_ard_columns = list(group1 = by, variable = variable, context = "fishertest")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' my_ard_fishertest(mtcars, by = "am", variable = "vs")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
tidy_as_ard <- function(lst_tidy,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
                        tidy_result_names,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
                        fun_args_to_record = character(0L),

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
                        formals = list(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
                        passed_args = list(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
                        lst_ard_columns) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    4x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  # used argument values -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    4x
                    
                      
  lst_used_fun_args <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    4x
                    
                      
    tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    4x
                    
                      
      utils::modifyList(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    4x
                    
                      
        x =

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
        # missing() is TRUE if the arg is not specified,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
        # not actually missing (ie it can still have its default value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    4x
                    
                      
          if (missing(formals)) formals else formals[fun_args_to_record],

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    4x
                    
                      
        val = passed_args,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    4x
                    
                      
        keep.null = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    4x
                    
                      
      error = function(e) list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  # if there are results, put them in the ARD format ---------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(lst_tidy[["result"]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
