    # combine results and function argument

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    3x
                    
                      
    lst_all_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    3x
                    
                      
      c(unclass(lst_tidy[["result"]]), lst_used_fun_args)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  # if there was an error calculating results, tidy up what we can -------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    # combine empty results and function arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    1x
                    
                      
    lst_all_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    1x
                    
                      
      utils::modifyList(

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    1x
                    
                      
        x =

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    1x
                    
                      
          rep_len(

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    1x
                    
                      
            x = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    1x
                    
                      
            length.out = length(c(tidy_result_names, fun_args_to_record))

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
          ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    1x
                    
                      
            stats::setNames(nm = c(tidy_result_names, fun_args_to_record)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    1x
                    
                      
        val = lst_used_fun_args,

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    1x
                    
                      
        keep.null = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  # add results to tibble ------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    4x
                    
                      
  dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    4x
                    
                      
    stat_name = names(lst_all_results),

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    4x
                    
                      
    stat = lst_all_results,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    4x
                    
                      
    fmt_fun = lapply(.data$stat, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    33x
                    
                      
      switch(is.numeric(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    14x
                    
                      
        1L

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
    }),

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    4x
                    
                      
    warning = lst_tidy["warning"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    4x
                    
                      
    error = lst_tidy["error"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    4x
                    
                      
    !!!lst_ard_columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    4x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_column_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    4x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_row_order() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    4x
                    
                      
    as_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' As card function

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Add attributes to a function that specify the expected results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' It is used when `ard_continuous()` or `ard_complex()` errors and constructs

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' an ARD with the correct structure when the results cannot be calculated.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param f (`function`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   a function

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param stat_names (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   a character vector of the expected statistic names returned by function `f`

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @name as_cards_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' # When there is no error, everything works as if we hadn't used `as_card_fn()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' ttest_works <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   as_cards_fn(

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \(x) t.test(x)[c("statistic", "p.value")],

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     stat_names = c("statistic", "p.value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   mtcars,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = mpg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = ~ list(ttest = ttest_works)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' # When there is an error and we use `as_card_fn()`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' #   we will see the same structure as when there is no error

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' ttest_error <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   as_cards_fn(

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'     \(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'       t.test(x)[c("statistic", "p.value")]

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'       stop("Intentional Error")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'     },

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'     stat_names = c("statistic", "p.value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   mtcars,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = mpg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = ~ list(ttest = ttest_error)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' # if we don't use `as_card_fn()` and there is an error,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' #   the returned result is only one row

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   mtcars,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = mpg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = ~ list(ttest = \(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'     t.test(x)[c("statistic", "p.value")]

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'     stop("Intentional Error")

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   })

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname as_cards_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
as_cards_fn <- function(f, stat_names) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    5x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    5x
                    
                      
  check_class(f, "function")

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    5x
                    
                      
  check_class(stat_names, "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  # add attribute --------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    5x
                    
                      
  attr(f, "stat_names") <- stat_names

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  # return function and add a class --------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    5x
                    
                      
  structure(f, class = c("cards_fn", class(f)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname as_cards_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
is_cards_fn <- function(f) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    13x
                    
                      
  inherits(f, "cards_fn")

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname as_cards_fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
get_cards_fn_stat_names <- function(f) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_class(f, "cards_fn")

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    3x
                    
                      
  attr(f, "stat_names")

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD Total N

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Returns the total N for the data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' The placeholder variable name returned in the object is `"..ard_total_n.."`

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ard_dichotomous

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams rlang::args_dots_empty

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @name ard_total_n

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_total_n(ADSL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_total_n

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
ard_total_n <- function(data, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    12x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    12x
                    
                      
  UseMethod("ard_total_n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_total_n

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
ard_total_n.data.frame <- function(data, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  # process inputs -------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    11x
                    
                      
  set_cli_abort_call()

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    11x
                    
                      
  check_dots_empty()

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    11x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate total N ----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    11x
                    
                      
  data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    11x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(..ard_total_n.. = TRUE) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    11x
                    
                      
    ard_dichotomous(variables = "..ard_total_n..", statistic = list(..ard_total_n.. = "N")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    11x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "total_n") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    11x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-all_ard_variables("levels"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Defaults for Statistical Arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    2

                    4

#' default_stat_labels()

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
default_stat_labels <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    63440x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    63440x
                    
                      
    mean = "Mean",

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    63440x

                    63440x

                    16
                    63440x

                    17
                    63440x

                    18
                    63440x
                    
                      
    p75 = "Q3",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    63440x
                    
                      
    min = "Min",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    63440x
                    
                      
    max = "Max",

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    63440x
                    
                      
    n = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    63440x
                    
                      
    N = "N",

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    63440x
                    
                      
    p = "%",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    63440x
                    
                      
    n_cum = "Cumulative n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    63440x
                    
                      
    p_cum = "Cumulative %",

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    63440x
                    
                      
    N_obs = "Vector Length",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    63440x
                    
                      
    N_miss = "N Missing",

    N_nonmiss = "N Non-missing",

    p_nonmiss = "% Non-missing"

#' @import rlang

#' @importFrom dplyr across

utils::globalVariables(c(".", "!<-", "parse_expr<-"))

release_bullets <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    !
                    
                      
  c("Install package and re-build `pkgdown/index.Rmd`")

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
}
